programme.title: Ne sievietes darbs
programme.desc: Svetlana Igoreva ir talantīga un veiksmīga izmeklētāja, un viņai apstākļu sakritības rezultātā no lielpilsētas nākas atgriezties dzimtajā pilsētiņā. Svetlana ir fanātiski nodevusies darbam, kuru viņai nākas savienot ar mātes lomu pusaudzim sarežģītā vecumā un mēģinājumiem sakārtot savu privāto dzīvi. Kolēģu savstarpējās attiecības un attieksme pret sievieti vīriešu kolektīvā mazpilsētā krasi atšķiras no tā, pie kā radusi Svetlana, un nav vienkārši lavierēt starp karjeru un ģimeni, privāto un sabiedrisko dzīvi. Lai arī pilsētiņa nav liela, un visi šeit viens otru pazīst, noziegumi notiek tādi, par kādiem pabrīnītos pat metropolē. Galvenajās lomās: Aļona Kolomina, Antons Batirevs, Andrejs Isajenko.

Vienība, kurā ietilpst augstākās raudzes profesionāļi - divi izmeklētāju pāri, viņu priekšnieks un prokurors - visi kopā nenogurstoši strādā, lai atšķetinātu nežēlīgākos un piņķerīgākos noziegumus un vainīgie saņemtu pelnītu sodu. Galvenajās lomās: Jeļena Bereznova, Aļisa Bogarta, Dmitrijs Brusņikins, Maksims Glotovs

programme.title: Izmeklēšanas aģentūra "SLED"
programme.desc: Seriāls vēsta par Federālā dienesta īpašo nodaļu, kas apvienojusi unikālus speciālistus dažādās nozarēs - IT ģēnijus, ballistikas un tiesu medicīnas ekspertus, operatīvos darbiniekus. Kopā viņi veic visplašākā spektra ekspertīzes, tādējādi reizē izmeklējot vissarežģītākos noziegumus un izskaitļojot visviltīgākos vainīgos. Pie šīs nodaļas pēc palīdzības griežas gan prokuratūras augstākā vadība, gan ierindas operatīvie darbinieki. Galvenajās lomās: Olga Koposova, Vladimirs Tašlikovs, Igors Romašenko, Pāvels Šuvajevs

programme.title: Ne sievietes darbs
programme.desc: Svetlana Igoreva ir talantīga un veiksmīga izmeklētāja, un viņai apstākļu sakritības rezultātā no lielpilsētas nākas atgriezties dzimtajā pilsētiņā. Svetlana ir fanātiski nodevusies darbam, kuru viņai nākas savienot ar mātes lomu pusaudzim sarežģītā vecumā un mēģinājumiem sakārtot savu privāto dzīvi. Kolēģu savstarpējās attiecības un attieksme pret sievieti vīriešu kolektīvā mazpilsētā krasi atšķiras no tā, pie kā radusi Svetlana, un nav vienkārši lavierēt starp karjeru un ģimeni, privāto un sabiedrisko dzīvi. Lai arī pilsētiņa nav liela, un visi šeit viens otru pazīst, noziegumi notiek tādi, par kādiem pabrīnītos pat metropolē. Galvenajās lomās: Aļona Kolomina, Antons Batirevs, Andrejs Isajenko.

programme.title: Izmeklēšanas aģentūra "SLED"
programme.desc: Kad policija ir bezspēcīga, palīgā dodas Īpašā izmeklēšanas aģentūra SLED. Tā ir īpaši izveidota struktūra policijas galvenās pārvaldes sastāvā un tieši pakļauta ģenerālim - Ukrainas Iekšlietu ministra vietniekam. Vienība nodarbojas ar īpaši skaļu, sarežģītu un smagu noziegumu izmeklēšanu. Tai pieejamas vismodernākās tehnoloģijas un valsts labākie kriminālisti un tiesu medicīnas laboratorijas. Protams, vienībā darbojas arī tikai labākie operatīvie darbinieki, kuri nepieļaus, ka kāda lieta netiktu atrisināta. Galvenajās lomās: Tatjana Kravčenko, Boriss Georgijevskijs, Aleksejs Surovcevs.

programme.title: Izmeklēšanas aģentūra "SLED"
programme.desc: Seriāls vēsta par Federālā dienesta īpašo nodaļu, kas apvienojusi unikālus speciālistus dažādās nozarēs - IT ģēnijus, ballistikas un tiesu medicīnas ekspertus, operatīvos darbiniekus. programme.title: Pandemic
programme.desc: After a virus overtakes the planet, humanity starts losing its grip on survival. A brilliant doctor travels to LA to lead a team to hunt for and rescue uninfected survivors - and find a cure.

programme.title: Crimson Rivers 2: Angels of the Apocalypse
programme.desc: Pierre Niemans faces the threat of the apocalypse while investigating a series of ritual murders.

programme.title: The Walking Dead: The Ones Who Live
Gone But Not Forgotten!
programme.desc: MTV remembers some of the most legendary artists who are no longer with us, with this playlist featuring their unforgettable music.

programme.title: Gone But Not Forgotten!
programme.desc: MTV remembers some of the most legendary artists who are no longer with us, with this playlist featuring their unforgettable music.

programme.title: Zoom In
programme.desc: Zoom In is a TV series that helps us to peep into the inside of the magic process of film making. It is an exciting trip to the hottest movies production. Get the insiders look at the budget and the crew all in just seven minutes. Top actors and actresses, writers, producers and directors share a part of their secrets about their job. See with your own eyes the action scenes from shooting and find out what it is really like to make a movie.

programme.title: Close Up
programme.desc: Exploring the lives and careers of the well-known and famous from the worlds of music and film, these 26-minute long biographical portraits provide a pictorial insight into the background, careers and personal lives of some of the twentieth-centurys best known personalities and iconic faces.

programme.title: Replacing Dad
programme.desc: Linda and George live in a small town where he is the school principal and they are about to celebrate their 16th anniversary. When she catches him with her daughters young teacher, she must deal with the kids, the town, and her love for him.

programme.title: Farscape: The Peacekeeper Wars
programme.desc: American science fiction series centering on human astronaut John Crichton as the fate of the Peacekeeper race rests on his shoulders. Brought back by the Peacekeeper Alliance, Crichton is their last hope when a monstrous war is waged by the sinister Scarran Empire, and the resilient astronaut must do all he can to protect the people from being destroyed, and the universe from being consumed by the plans of the evil empire. The two-part series follows on from the original Farscape series which, after its cancellation, was left needing to be brought to a conclusion.

programme.title: Farscape: The Peacekeeper Wars
programme.desc: American science fiction series centering on human astronaut John Crichton as the fate of the Peacekeeper race rests on his shoulders. The two-part series follows on from the original Farscape series which, after its cancellation, was left needing to be brought to a conclusion.

programme.title: Mystery Woman 8: Wild West Mystery
programme.desc: Former Red River TV series star Clint Lawsons Wild West show is in town, the prize act in the annual festival, which the sponsoring bookshop is presiding over. He strains a leg due to a sabotaged saddle strap. His stand-in, Dogie, is fatally shot while starring in his place, so who was the intended target? Evidence seems to pile up against Clint, so the chief simply jails him without further investigation. However, the bookshop sleuths team digs up dirty secrets from their past and that of other show cast, such as ex-con announcer Jeb Fletcher, Clints ex-lover Annie whom he promised a movie part like Strother Elam, and Zeke Foster, who secretly deals in illegitimate Red River memorabilia.

programme.title: The King and Queen of Moonlight Bay
programme.desc: A college girl decides to get to know her estranged father before she begins her education, but his life turns out to be nothing that she expected.

programme.title: Stranded
programme.desc: David Robinson is being shipped off to a penal colony. His wife and kids are allowed to accompany him. A storm strikes the ship and the family (save for one son, Jacob) are trapped below deck. Jacob is raised by pirates, and the family gets out of the boat and on to land, salvaging as much as they can from the boat, including dogs, chickens, and muskets. They learn to survive and build a shelter on land. Then, Jacobs pirates kidnap Emily, the daughter of a sea-captain. She escapes onto the island and becomes a love interest with Fritz and Ernst. Jacob is reunited with his family during a battle with the pirates over Emily, and she is returned to her father. In the end, the family goes their own ways, some staying on the island, some going home.

programme.title: The Yeltsin Project
programme.desc: Russian political elite hires American consultants to help with President Yeltsins re-election campaign when his approval rating is down to single digits.

programme.title: Shattered City: The Halifax Explosion
programme.desc: A true story about the tragic explosion at Halifax Harbour, Canada in the early hours of December 6, 1917.

programme.title: National Lampoons Attack of the 5 ft. 2 Woman
programme.desc: Julie Brown stars in two media satires as figure skater Tonya Hardly and as angry wife Lenora Babbitt.

programme.title: The Pleasure of Your Company
programme.desc: Romantic comedy, starring Jason Biggs and Isla Fisher. Loved-up Anderson is in the middle of proposing to his girlfriend when the unthinkable happens and she dies. He sinks into depression and is convinced he will never find love again. However, a year later, he impulsively pops the question to a waitress and she agrees. Joe Pantoliano also features.

programme.title: Bring It On
programme.desc: A champion high school cheerleading squad discovers its previous captain stole all their best routines from an inner-city school and must scramble to compete at this years championships.

programme.title: Mystery Woman 9: Oh Baby
programme.desc: A couple accused of a murder go on the run, leaving their baby in the care of bookshop owner and amateur sleuth Samantha Kinsey. Can Samantha look after the baby and solve the case?

programme.title: Mystery Woman 6: Redemption
programme.desc: A rare first edition from a pioneer author goes missing in the mystery novels-specialized Kinsey bookshop during remodeling by the local firm of Tyler Dell, who recently lost his father, a Vietnam veteran. Retired English teacher Jim Carter, who overheard everything, is murdered shortly after a row in Reverend Tuckers homeless shelter Haven with aggressive lush Murphy. Rude police chief Connors isnt up to an investigation while the killer keeps sniping, so the bookstores armchair sleuths duo does it alone, starting from a lacquered box left by Jim for his illegitimate daughter, who never even knew his name. It starts a set of cues, slowly unraveling a grim intrigue starting during a 1965 US illegal intrusion into Red Khmer territory.

programme.title: Aces N Eights
programme.desc: Western directed by Craig R. Baxley. When peaceful settlers are gunned down in the uncharted west, justice falls onto the shoulders of an elderly rancher.

programme.title: The Devils Whore
programme.desc: After Angelica Fanshawes country noble mother chooses the Catholic faith over the Anglican law of England, her daughter becomes a royal ward of king Charles I, who allows her love marriage to childhood friend and cousin Harry Fanshawe. But social resistance to the kings absolutism, till then maintained by whip in an iron hand, culminates in a parliamentary rebellion, which spills to utter civil war. It means their utter downfall, Harry being executed because his royalist troops capitulated to military genius Oliver Cromwells while their estate hosts the royal court on permanent flight.

programme.title: The Devils Whore
programme.desc: The people of the besieged city of Oxford are in a desperate situation. Devastated by the Kings brutal betrayal, Angelica has been cast out of court, and finds herself destitute and starving. Meanwhile, divisions are beginning to split the Parliamentarians.

programme.title: Tales Of the Walking Dead
programme.desc: Hostile co-workers Blair and Gina try to escape the city - and each other - at the start of the Apocalypse.

programme.title: Swamp Devil
programme.desc: A young girl finds out some disturbing supernatural truths about her father, who has been a suspect to multiple murder cases.

programme.title: Redeemer
programme.desc: A writer is touched by the story of a former Black Panther who seams to have been wrongfully convicted to life imprisonment 20 years ago. The writer decides to try to help the now middle-aged convict get exonerated.

programme.title: The Final Days of Planet Earth
programme.desc: Archaeologist Lloyd Walker uncovers an alien involving Room 86 and the Pericles space mission, battling against insurmountable odds to save humanity from enslavement by menacing insect-like aliens.

programme.title: The Final Days of Planet Earth
programme.desc: Archaeologist Lloyd Walker uncovers an alien involving Room 86 and the Pericles space mission, battling against insurmountable odds to save humanity from enslavement by menacing insect-like aliens.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: The Vet Life is an amazing series revolving around three friends, three vets, Diarra Blue, Aubrey Ross, and Mike Lavigne and their everyday lives. These guys became friends back in University, then they worked in Las Vegas and finally moved to Texas and opened a full-service veterinary hospital of their own. The series highlights their daily routine, their duties at work and at home, their families and pets.

programme.title: My Tiny Terror
programme.desc: Attempting to teach some bad dogs new tricks, small-dog trainer Jacqueline Wilson uses her tried and tested methods to get these badly behaved pups to buck up their ideas. These ill-mannered, miniature hounds may look innocent and cuddly, but their behavioural problems have left their owners with no choice but to call in Jacqueline. From biting strangers to incessant howling, these owners are at their wits end, and need Jacqueline to change the problematic characteristics of their beloved pets. American reality series.

programme.title: Toucan Nation
programme.desc: An animal refuge in Costa Rica takes in a mutilated toucan and gives it a second chance by making it a prosthetic beak with the help of a 3D printer.

programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: Im Alive is an American reality television series featuring unbelievable stories of real people who managed to survive dreadful animal attacks, including reenactments of thrilling stories by real actors. Find out about people bitten by a black widow, attacked by a bull shark, stung by a deathstalker scorpion or bitten by an eastern diamondback rattlesnake, and how they manage to stay alive at all costs in the face of an unexpected predator attack.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Follow aquarium enthusiasts Brett Raymer and Wayde King as they attempt to build some of the most luxurious fish tanks in the world. At Acrylic Tank Manufacturing, the brothers-in-law guide you through the design process and the building of their truly jaw-dropping aquariums. Experience the unveiling of finished tanks housed everywhere from restaurants and banks, to glamorous casinos and mansions. Join the duo in their Las Vegas workshop as they deliver some budget-shattering builds to their high-profile clientele.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: The Vet Life is an amazing series revolving around three friends, three vets, Diarra Blue, Aubrey Ross, and Mike Lavigne and their everyday lives. These guys became friends back in University, then they worked in Las Vegas and finally moved to Texas and opened a full-service veterinary hospital of their own. The series highlights their daily routine, their duties at work and at home, their families and pets.

programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: The Last Alaskans is an American reality TV series following several families and trappers who are allowed to live in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska. Have a close look at their daily routine in the most remote area of the US. Far away from the civilization, they have to deal with harsh weather and arctic conditions, wildlife and long distances without any modern conveniences. Heimo, Bob, Ray, Tyler and their families offer you an honest view of their struggle and thrive in Alaskas untouched wilderness.

programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: Im Alive is an American reality television series featuring unbelievable stories of real people who managed to survive dreadful animal attacks, including reenactments of thrilling stories by real actors. Find out about people bitten by a black widow, attacked by a bull shark, stung by a deathstalker scorpion or bitten by an eastern diamondback rattlesnake, and how they manage to stay alive at all costs in the face of an unexpected predator attack.

programme.title: My Cat from Hell
programme.desc: Jackson Galaxy is a cat behaviorist. He is the person who resolves conflicts or behavioral issues between the owners and their cats or even between the cats and other pets. These are attacks and misbehavior, and Jackson is a true cat-lover and a believer that any problem can be solved thanks to love, patience and proper handling. Taking good care of cats is a demanding process and a whole science, but in return you will get a loving and purring family member.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: US reality TV show follows the Irwin family through their adventures in continuing Steve Irwins legacy. The family share their wildlife experiences from their travels across the world. They show how they care for all the animals while giving insight into their family life at Australia Zoo where they live and work. The Australian family including mother Terri who is a naturalist and conservationist stars alongside daughter Bindi and son Robert who are fully immerse in animal life and their family.

programme.title: Dr. Dee: Alaska Vet
programme.desc: Dr Dee moved to Alaska and started veterinary practice, and now her Animal House is the top animal hospital in the state. Together with her stuff she handles the most extreme cases and treats everyone, from a reindeer to a sled dog. She can reach the Alaskan most remote areas thanks to her pilots license. She believes with all her heart that all animals deserve the best care. Her husband Ken is a great helper, they rescue unwanted and stray dogs and look for a better place for them.

programme.title: Jeremy Wades Dark Waters
programme.desc: Join biologist and angling expert Jeremy Wade as he travels the world peering through our darkest, murky waters, investigating tales of mythical monsters, mutated beasts and depleting fish populations. The star of River Monsters is back to explain the unexplainable, as he investigates these reported sightings of unknown creatures. Whether its Lake Gardas reptilian monster, a species of pike the size of a man, a river monster deemed extinct in the Outback or South Africas fabled half-man, half-fish monster, Jeremy will need to use all of his experience if he is to catch, or even glimpse, these creatures.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet is a TV series entirely dedicated to love and care for animals. Thanks to a genius Dr. Jeff Young Denvers Planned Pethood Plus veterinary clinic is always busy and is taking care of 80,000-plus clients and their pets. Dr. Jeffs sharp surgical skills and his unconditional love for animals make him one of the most respected vets in the country. Dr. Jeff has a dedicated team of more than 30 veterinary staffers and once a month they go to remote locations where people do not have access to vets.

programme.title: Tanked: on Call
programme.desc: Brett and Wayde ambush unsuspecting aquarium owners in desperate need of a tank makeover. Working together they make the aquarium more beautiful and easier to maintain.

programme.title: The Vet Life

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Reality series, set in Texas and similar to North Woods Law, that follows daily lives of men and women who are Game Wardens and whose job is to protect deserts, lakes, woods, bayous, coasts and wild animals that live in the second-largest state in the U.S. These people have their plates full as they must deal with poachers, hunters who dont obey the law, smugglers, while they rescue injured wildlife and defend citizens.

programme.title: Treetop Cat Rescue
programme.desc: Climbing enthusiasts brother-in-law duo Shaun Sears and Tom Otto work together to rescue the felines that climb beyond capability and get stuck in Washington State. The experienced tree climbers do their best to rescue all of the cats they find out about whether a call comes in at day or night. With sometimes unfavourable weather, weak branches and bees nests to overcome the pair have to overcome obstacles and then have to avoid scaring the cats away as they approach.

programme.title: Treetop Cat Rescue
programme.desc: Climbing enthusiasts brother-in-law duo Shaun Sears and Tom Otto work together to rescue the felines that climb beyond capability and get stuck in Washington State. The experienced tree climbers do their best to rescue all of the cats they find out about whether a call comes in at day or night. With sometimes unfavourable weather, weak branches and bees nests to overcome the pair have to overcome obstacles and then have to avoid scaring the cats away as they approach.

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: American reality series following the team at the Villalobos Rescue centre on their quest to rescue and rehome dogs. Founded by Tia Maria Torres, the centre challenges the misconceptions surrounding bully breeds, such as pit bulls, with hopes of eventually rehoming them. Alongside Tia are her team of dog-loving parolees, each tasked with training, rescuing and caring for the animals. Each episode covers the emotional stories of both her employees and their rescue dogs. Will their jobs help them as they transition away from jail or will they struggle alongside the pups to rebuild their reputation?

programme.title: Dogs/Cats/Pets
programme.desc: Cats and dogs are welcome companions in many homes, with their loving characters cementing their status as part of the family. This documentary series divulges extraordinary facts about cats and dogs, offering unique insight into their traits and behaviours. Learn about quirky breeds and their distinct qualities, discover their wonderful talents and explore the different ways we humans use them.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Treehouse Masters is an American reality television series hosted by Pete Nelson, a treehouse builder. Pete and his team design and build all types of treehouses for clients across the country. The clients and Petes team are the people who never stop dreaming. Youll be surprised to know how many people want to get away from the noisy comfortable cities and live in close communion with mother nature. So getting a treehouse is their chance to live a dream. Every episode will amaze you because of Petes talent and incredible imagination. He can build any type of a treehouse, starting from a small simple ones to most complex residences with all modern communication. Every wish of a customer will be heard and fulfilled.

programme.title: The Sharks Of Headstone Hell
programme.desc: Shark scientist Riley Elliot is on Norfolk Island to discover if the practice of tossing animal carcasses in the sea has changed the behaviour of the areas huge tiger sharks.

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: Flying Wild Alaska is a reality television show following the lives of the Tweto family who live in the city of Unalakleet and run an important airline in Alaska, transporting passengers and supplies to isolated parts of the state. Jim, his wife Ferno, daughters Ariel and Ayla and a team of pilots provide service to hardly accessible villages on the Bering sea coastline, in often very dangerous missions. Join them in dramatic moments, as they face extreme weather conditions, from icy storms and strong winds to a two month long winter darkness.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: The Vet Life is an amazing series revolving around three friends, three vets, Diarra Blue, Aubrey Ross, and Mike Lavigne and their everyday lives. These guys became friends back in University, then they worked in Las Vegas and finally moved to Texas and opened a full-service veterinary hospital of their own. The series highlights their daily routine, their duties at work and at home, their families and pets.

programme.title: Weird, True, Freaky
programme.desc: Unusual biology, unique animal behavior and traits, animal-human relationships, experimental animals, humans who possess animal instincts, exotic breeds, surviving populations and many more unbelievable topics. It delivers in-depth analysis of amazing animal footage and fresh insight from scholars, including Stanford University animal experts Dr. Jill Helms and Dr. Sophia Yin, exotic animal specialist Dave Riherd, and snake wrangler Jason C. McElroy.

programme.title: With a fishing rod to the end of the world
programme.desc: Four avid anglers embark on the adventure of a lifetime, as they travel across the seven continents to fish where no one has fished before. These four, very different characters are made up of Chris Owens, Thad Robison, Brian Jill and Jay Johnson, and all of them have decided to leave their homes and hit the road. With much of the land inaccessible by any other means, theyre driving across the world to reach wild locations, where they will cast out and try to catch some of the rarest fish on the planet. A remarkable documentary series following the determined group of best friends, as they traverse dangerous roads, deadly terrain and precarious waters to achieve their dreams.

programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: Im Alive is an American reality television series featuring unbelievable stories of real people who managed to survive dreadful animal attacks, including reenactments of thrilling stories by real actors. Find out about people bitten by a black widow, attacked by a bull shark, stung by a deathstalker scorpion or bitten by an eastern diamondback rattlesnake, and how they manage to stay alive at all costs in the face of an unexpected predator attack.

programme.title: Tanked: on Call
programme.desc: Brett and Wayde ambush unsuspecting aquarium owners in desperate need of a tank makeover. Working together they make the aquarium more beautiful and easier to maintain.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: The Vet Life is an amazing series revolving around three friends, three vets, Diarra Blue, Aubrey Ross, and Mike Lavigne and their everyday lives. These guys became friends back in University, then they worked in Las Vegas and finally moved to Texas and opened a full-service veterinary hospital of their own. The series highlights their daily routine, their duties at work and at home, their families and pets.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: The Vet Life is an amazing series revolving around three friends, three vets, Diarra Blue, Aubrey Ross, and Mike Lavigne and their everyday lives. These guys became friends back in University, then they worked in Las Vegas and finally moved to Texas and opened a full-service veterinary hospital of their own. The series highlights their daily routine, their duties at work and at home, their families and pets.

programme.title: The Sharks Of Headstone Hell
programme.desc: Shark scientist Riley Elliot is on Norfolk Island to discover if the practice of tossing animal carcasses in the sea has changed the behaviour of the areas huge tiger sharks.

programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: Im Alive is an American reality television series featuring unbelievable stories of real people who managed to survive dreadful animal attacks, including reenactments of thrilling stories by real actors. Find out about people bitten by a black widow, attacked by a bull shark, stung by a deathstalker scorpion or bitten by an eastern diamondback rattlesnake, and how they manage to stay alive at all costs in the face of an unexpected predator attack.

programme.title: My Cat from Hell
programme.desc: Jackson Galaxy is a cat behaviorist. He is the person who resolves conflicts or behavioral issues between the owners and their cats or even between the cats and other pets. These are attacks and misbehavior, and Jackson is a true cat-lover and a believer that any problem can be solved thanks to love, patience and proper handling. Taking good care of cats is a demanding process and a whole science, but in return you will get a loving and purring family member.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: US reality TV show follows the Irwin family through their adventures in continuing Steve Irwins legacy. The family share their wildlife experiences from their travels across the world. They show how they care for all the animals while giving insight into their family life at Australia Zoo where they live and work. The Australian family including mother Terri who is a naturalist and conservationist stars alongside daughter Bindi and son Robert who are fully immerse in animal life and their family.

programme.title: Gamechangers: Inventing the World
programme.desc: These pioneering gamechangers are working bring a sustainable future to our planet, transforming how we use science, technology and engineering to change societal outlooks. We follow the teams as they work across the entire world, from the deserted Australian outback to the tropical Amazon rainforests, as they design and test these advances in science. Whether its testing the possibility of survival on Mars, ensuring potable water supplies or reducing carbon emissions, this fascinating documentary series inspires us to change the way we live.

programme.title: Jeremy Wades Dark Waters
programme.desc: Join biologist and angling expert Jeremy Wade as he travels the world peering through our darkest, murky waters, investigating tales of mythical monsters, mutated beasts and depleting fish populations. The star of River Monsters is back to explain the unexplainable, as he investigates these reported sightings of unknown creatures. Whether its Lake Gardas reptilian monster, a species of pike the size of a man, a river monster deemed extinct in the Outback or South Africas fabled half-man, half-fish monster, Jeremy will need to use all of his experience if he is to catch, or even glimpse, these creatures.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet is a TV series entirely dedicated to love and care for animals. Thanks to a genius Dr. Jeff Young Denvers Planned Pethood Plus veterinary clinic is always busy and is taking care of 80,000-plus clients and their pets. Dr. Jeffs sharp surgical skills and his unconditional love for animals make him one of the most respected vets in the country. Dr. Jeff has a dedicated team of more than 30 veterinary staffers and once a month they go to remote locations where people do not have access to vets.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Reality series, set in Texas and similar to North Woods Law, that follows daily lives of men and women who are Game Wardens and whose job is to protect deserts, lakes, woods, bayous, coasts and wild animals that live in the second-largest state in the U.S. These people have their plates full as they must deal with poachers, hunters who dont obey the law, smugglers, while they rescue injured wildlife and defend citizens.

programme.title: Treetop Cat Rescue
programme.desc: Climbing enthusiasts brother-in-law duo Shaun Sears and Tom Otto work together to rescue the felines that climb beyond capability and get stuck in Washington State. The experienced tree climbers do their best to rescue all of the cats they find out about whether a call comes in at day or night. With sometimes unfavourable weather, weak branches and bees nests to overcome the pair have to overcome obstacles and then have to avoid scaring the cats away as they approach.

programme.title: Treetop Cat Rescue
programme.desc: Climbing enthusiasts brother-in-law duo Shaun Sears and Tom Otto work together to rescue the felines that climb beyond capability and get stuck in Washington State. The experienced tree climbers do their best to rescue all of the cats they find out about whether a call comes in at day or night. With sometimes unfavourable weather, weak branches and bees nests to overcome the pair have to overcome obstacles and then have to avoid scaring the cats away as they approach.

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: American reality series following the team at the Villalobos Rescue centre on their quest to rescue and rehome dogs. Founded by Tia Maria Torres, the centre challenges the misconceptions surrounding bully breeds, such as pit bulls, with hopes of eventually rehoming them. Alongside Tia are her team of dog-loving parolees, each tasked with training, rescuing and caring for the animals. Each episode covers the emotional stories of both her employees and their rescue dogs. Will their jobs help them as they transition away from jail or will they struggle alongside the pups to rebuild their reputation?

programme.title: Dogs/Cats/Pets
programme.desc: Cats and dogs are welcome companions in many homes, with their loving characters cementing their status as part of the family. This documentary series divulges extraordinary facts about cats and dogs, offering unique insight into their traits and behaviours. Learn about quirky breeds and their distinct qualities, discover their wonderful talents and explore the different ways we humans use them.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Treehouse Masters is an American reality television series hosted by Pete Nelson, a treehouse builder. Pete and his team design and build all types of treehouses for clients across the country. The clients and Petes team are the people who never stop dreaming. Youll be surprised to know how many people want to get away from the noisy comfortable cities and live in close communion with mother nature. So getting a treehouse is their chance to live a dream. Every episode will amaze you because of Petes talent and incredible imagination. He can build any type of a treehouse, starting from a small simple ones to most complex residences with all modern communication. Every wish of a customer will be heard and fulfilled.

programme.title: Toucan Nation
programme.desc: An animal refuge in Costa Rica takes in a mutilated toucan and gives it a second chance by making it a prosthetic beak with the help of a 3D printer.

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: Flying Wild Alaska is a reality television show following the lives of the Tweto family who live in the city of Unalakleet and run an important airline in Alaska, transporting passengers and supplies to isolated parts of the state. Jim, his wife Ferno, daughters Ariel and Ayla and a team of pilots provide service to hardly accessible villages on the Bering sea coastline, in often very dangerous missions. Join them in dramatic moments, as they face extreme weather conditions, from icy storms and strong winds to a two month long winter darkness.

programme.title: The Vet Life

These guys became friends back in University, then they worked in Las Vegas and finally moved to Texas and opened a full-service veterinary hospital of their own. The series highlights their daily routine, their duties at work and at home, their families and pets.

programme.title: Surviving Joe Exotic
programme.desc: Joe Exotic gives one of his last interviews before his arrest. Ex-employees reveal the truth about his G.W. Zoo.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: The story follows the work of the dedicated staff of Gulf Coast veterinary clinic, an emergency animal hospital where patients that require critical care are treated by professionals trained to handle a variety of services, ranging from routine check-ups to extremely complex veterinary procedures.

programme.title: The Travel Show
programme.desc: Join the Travel Show team as they take you on a criss-cross journey across the globe, visiting the most popular holiday destinations as well as sampling some hidden gems. The itinerary includes up-and-coming hot spots for holidaymakers and uncovering some lesser-known facts about places on many peoples bucket lists. This BBC programme takes you to every corner of the planet, providing an all-round insight into the world of travel. From winter wonderland activities such as eco skiing in Denmark and trekking across glaciers in Iceland, to warmer destinations as diverse as Rwanda and the Great Barrier Reef in Australia, your adventure starts here.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and union leaders, and analytical reports that delve behind the headlines. Regular presenters cross-examine studio guests on details of policies, priorities, actions and inactions, on a range of domestic UK and international topics. There are weekly features on the arts, sports and the world of technology, and editors are not afraid to venture into niche, specialist and exotic areas from space travel to animal psychology. If the BBCs flagship Radio 4 Today programme sets the early morning news agenda for the day, then its late-night TV equivalent often gives the people in power some sleepless nights.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: Join BBC journalists including political editor Laura Kuenssberg, Europe editor Katya Adler, Brussels correspondent Adam Fleming and political correspondent Chris Mason in their weekly podcast discussing all of the news stories that matter to the people of the United Kingdom. The journalists know all about the stories that theyre talking about - they interview the most important people involved in the stories that feature in the news. They speak of their knowledge and understanding of the news in a way that is understandable for all. Laura is often in a car in the middle of a city where big politics stories are happening. Katya, Adam and Chris are usually in the studio. They regularly talk about Brexit and what is going to happen when the United Kingdom leaves the European Union.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. programme.title: Tech Now
programme.desc: A round-up of how AI is being used in many areas of our lives.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.desc: The latest business news from Singapore and around the world.

programme.desc: A round-up of the days sporting action.

programme.title: Focus on Africa
programme.desc: Focus on Africa is a BBC news program broadcast globally and on local partner channels of the BBC in African countries. The program used to be presented by Komla Dumor each weekday from its inception until his death in 2014; now it is hosted by Sophie Ikenye, a news presenter from Kenya. programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and union leaders, and analytical reports that delve behind the headlines. Regular presenters cross-examine studio guests on details of policies, priorities, actions and inactions, on a range of domestic UK and international topics. There are weekly features on the arts, sports and the world of technology, and editors are not afraid to venture into niche, specialist and exotic areas from space travel to animal psychology. If the BBCs flagship Radio 4 Today programme sets the early morning news agenda for the day, then its late-night TV equivalent often gives the people in power some sleepless nights.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: Join BBC journalists including political editor Laura Kuenssberg, Europe editor Katya Adler, Brussels correspondent Adam Fleming and political correspondent Chris Mason in their weekly podcast discussing all of the news stories that matter to the people of the United Kingdom. The journalists know all about the stories that theyre talking about - they interview the most important people involved in the stories that feature in the news. They speak of their knowledge and understanding of the news in a way that is understandable for all. Laura is often in a car in the middle of a city where big politics stories are happening. Katya, Adam and Chris are usually in the studio. They regularly talk about Brexit and what is going to happen when the United Kingdom leaves the European Union.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: This Cultural Life
programme.desc: Screenwriter and playwright Abi Morgan has worked across a diverse array of themes and genres for more than 25 years. She wrote the television series The Split, a domestic drama involving divorce lawyers, and created the psychological Netflix series Eric. Her other television credits include Sex Traffic, for which she won a BAFTA for Best Drama Serial in 2005, and The Hour, the television news drama which earned her an Emmy Award in 2012. Her film credits include The Iron Lady, which starred Meryl Streep as Margaret Thatcher; historical drama Suffragette; and Shame, co-written with the director Steve McQueen. Her recent book This Is Not a Pity Memoir recounts her husbands recovery after serious illness, and her own treatment for cancer. Abi Morgan tells John Wilson about her childhood in a theatrical family; her father was the director Gareth Morgan, and her mother is the actor Pat England. She chooses the author, screenwriter and director Nora Ephron as an important influence, and particularly the film Heartburn, which Ephron adapted from her semi-autobiographical divorce novel. Abi also recalls the work of television screenwriter Kay Mellor, whose series Band of Gold and Playing the Field also influenced her own writing. She describes how seeing an exhibition of the work of artist Cornelia Parker, including her installation Cold Dark Matter: An Exploded View, inspired some of Abis early theatre work, including her plays Splendour and The Mistress Contract.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.desc: Focus on Africa is a BBC news program broadcast globally and on local partner channels of the BBC in African countries. programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. В арсенале у участников ГСР (группы стратегического реагирования) не только высокотехнологичное оружие, но еще и быстрый ум, интуиция и… багаж собственных проблем и травм, которые часто влияют на их работу.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Паркер попадает в ловушку. Группа Один пытается разыскать его. Похитители Паркера требуют, чтобы он раскрыть тайну из своего прошлого. Секрет Паркера касается восьмилетней девочки по имени Хейли, чья мать умерла во время перестрелки, когда Паркер и его коллеги обыскивали её дом. Похитители Паркера убеждены, что он выстрелил в мать Хейли, а затем заботился о ней из чувства вины.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Роберт Купер устраивает самосуд, после того, как его брат умирает от передозировки наркотиков. Группа Один пытается остановить Купера прежде, чем он убьет кого-то. Он направляется к братьям Стил, двум богатым мужчинам, которые распространяют наркотики. Тем временем Лия плохо отзывается о районе в котором рос Ворди, и они ссорятся.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family. / Anais arrives in the bedroom to find a messy crime-scene and her Daisy doll missing. She realises Gumball and Darwin are the chief suspects. / A mysterious figure from Nicoles past shows up and challenges her to a fight, but the kids are surprised when she refuses. / A compilation of some of the funniest, most bizarre clips uploaded onto the internet by the people of Elmore. / When Rob purchases a universal remote from the Awesome Store he discovers he can control the universe. He rewinds into the past and remembers Gumball had left him in The Void. / When we last saw Gumball he was hitting rewind on Robs Universal Remote just in time to save himself from being trapped in The Void. / Gumball and Darwin go to extreme lengths to help Molly make her dull stories more interesting. / Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore it appears exciting things are happening just not to them. 1

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are surprised to discover that their past actions have consequences. / Whilst Gumball and Darwin make fun of Mum and Dad for being old their voices start to break. / Sarah the new kid in school is Gumball and Darwins number one slightly obsessive fan. / The new coach at Elmore High stands up to Jamie. / The secret behind Antons immortality. / The kids finally get the puppy they always wanted except its a turtle. / When Mum reveals that Gumballs real name is Zach Gumball adopts a cheesy annoying persona to match the name. / Nothing much is happening for Gumball and Darwin and the background characters in Elmore seize their moment.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: Gumball: Darwins Yearbook
programme.desc: Darwin wants to put Alan on the cover of the school yearbook - but Alans apparent modesty gets in the way. / Principal Brown sets Darwin the task of making the school yearbook. / Darwin sets out to find a photo of Carrie for the cover of the school yearbook. / Darwin needs to find a photo of Clayton to put on the cover of the school yearbook. / Darwin asks Sarah for a photo to put on the cover of the school yearbook. / When Darwin asks his friends which teacher deserves to be on the yearbook cover they struggle to find a single worthy candidate!

programme.title: Lego DREAMZzz
programme.desc: Our heroes lay low in Central Park at the new and improved Beaus place, much to Zoeys embarrassment, as hes now a pacifist, granola version of himself called Light Hunter. There, they learn that the dream world has become a police state, with them as public enemy #1. They also meet Dreamsmashers replacement, D-Shock, who is determined to catch them.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Bunnicula
programme.desc: Once upon a time an extraordinary bunny is born in an average family of bunnies. The little guy looks just like a vampire- he has sharp fangs, his ears remind of bat wings and plus he is scared of sunlight. Bunnicula is never out in daylight, sleeps in a coffin, flies with bat wings, and drains juice from vegetables with his fangs which gives him enormous power. His family is afraid that he will attack somebody so they lock him in an old mansion. Bunnicula has been sleeping for many years until a little girl Mina unlocks hims and makes him a new member of her family. Her dog named Harold makes friends with Bunnicula straight away but the cat Chester is a little bit scared of him and does not seem to be happy about a new pet.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Nicole arranges a playdate for Anais with the son of a classy lady she met at the supermarket. / Richard has lost all of the familys money. Nicole is happy for the Wattersons to appear in a Joyful Burger commercial for some much needed cash. / Darwin joins the school marching band and his tin-whistle talent lands him the solo. / Rob creates a variety of spinoff Elmore shows and formats in order to replace Gumball.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Dad misses a package and is forced into an escalating feud with the delivery guy. / Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons must survive a bizarre game of Dodj or Daar through to the end. / Darwin has promised to play video games with Gumball but his promise with Banana Joe interferes. / Gumball and Darwin must apologise to everyone they know after getting a threatening message on Elmore Plus. / Gumball and Darwin try to understand Jukes urgent beatbox message. / Richard is left in charge for the day but his lack of rules attracts unwanted guests to the Watterson house. / Gumball and Darwin fail to make some instant homemade movie classics. / Gumball and Darwins reputation is challenged and they really couldnt care less... / Gumball accidentally uploads a video of himself and wants it gone. / The Watterson kids come up with a fool-proof plan.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin try to get a game back from Tobias but Darwin starts to feel like a sidekick to Gumball and refuses to follow his orders. / Richard overhears Gumball and Darwin making fun of him which hurts his feelings and he has to regain his reputation as a hero. / Gumball tries to look good in the school photo. / Gumball and Darwin get caught in the middle of a trash can war between Richard and Mr. Robinson. / Gumball and Darwin cheat on their maths test get detention and have to escape. / Nicole gets upset with the family at the supermarket when her kids want chocolate but she says no. / The Wattersons must survive a bizarre game of Dodj or Daar through to the end. / Darwin has promised to play video games with Gumball but his promise with Banana Joe interferes.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Grandpa Louie gives them a cheque, the Watterson kids argue over how to spend the money. / When they find Anais training herself for a brutal showdown Gumball and Darwin realise that their sister is being pestered at school by an annoying kid: Billy. / An impromptu hug with a stranger at school leaves Gumball in an increasingly awkward social situation. / Mom and the kids depart for their hard days work leaving a seemingly lazy Dad half-asleep on the sofa. Mom has given him one very simple job: buy mayonnaise. Director: Mic Graves,.

Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball sets out to solve the mystery of who stuffed Principal Brown into his locker. / Gumball and Darwins harmless pranks on Dad spiral hopelessly out of control. / Gumball and Darwins martial arts costumes make them a laughing stock at school. / Gumball is traumatised when accidentally kissed on the mouth by his Grandma JoJo. / Gumball and Darwin are invited to a high school party and have to bring a date! / Gumball and Darwin unsuccessfully attempt to get a refund for their computer game. / Gumball discovers that Bobert is planning to take over his identity and replace him! / Gumball and Darwin barely survive a school picnic in the Forest of Doom. / Gumball sets out to win his Dad back by winning a blindfolded "dumb" race.

programme.desc: The Colossus: Gumball and Darwin learn that it isnt wise to upset Hector Elmores resident Giant. / The Knights: Gumball and Tobias compete for Pennys affection by putting on the lamest duel in history. / The Remote: The Wattersons battle for possession of the TV remote gets dirty. / The Fridge: When Mom discovers Gumball has no ambition she is determined to turn him into a winner. / Gumball seeks justice when Banana Joe chews Darwins pen. / Gumball is determined to drive Penny away from Leslie / Darwin develops a texting addiction when he and Gumball get their first cell phone. / Richard gets a job as a pizza delivery man which worries Nicole when at the same time strange things begin to occur around the neighbourhood. / Gumball Darwin and Anais search for the Watterson family treasure.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mom sees Darwin gazing longingly at a fish-tank she thinks their mammalian lifestyle isnt fulfilling her adopted son and deep down he longs to connect with his fishy roots. / The Parent Teacher Association of Elmore Junior High bans video games, so the kids try and prove that games arent a bad influence. / Tobias follows every single high-five with a butt-slap so when Gumball doesnt get one he feels insulted. He tries to get Tobias to slap his rear all day but it doesnt work. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: Gumball: Darwins Yearbook
programme.desc: Darwin wants to put Alan on the cover of the school yearbook - but Alans apparent modesty gets in the way. / Principal Brown sets Darwin the task of making the school yearbook. / Darwin sets out to find a photo of Carrie for the cover of the school yearbook. / Darwin needs to find a photo of Clayton to put on the cover of the school yearbook. / Darwin asks Sarah for a photo to put on the cover of the school yearbook. / When Darwin asks his friends which teacher deserves to be on the yearbook cover they struggle to find a single worthy candidate!

programme.title: Lego DREAMZzz
programme.desc: Realizing that Happy App goggle production is way up, our heroes decide to infiltrate the Happy App building and shut down production. There, they run into a group of disused robots that are now living a Lord of the Flies existence under the Happy App building. Can Mateo, Izzie and the rest of the crew overcome being forced to join a Robot Fight Club and still complete their mission?

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Bunnicula
programme.desc: Once upon a time an extraordinary bunny is born in an average family of bunnies. The little guy looks just like a vampire- he has sharp fangs, his ears remind of bat wings and plus he is scared of sunlight. Bunnicula is never out in daylight, sleeps in a coffin, flies with bat wings, and drains juice from vegetables with his fangs which gives him enormous power. His family is afraid that he will attack somebody so they lock him in an old mansion. Bunnicula has been sleeping for many years until a little girl Mina unlocks hims and makes him a new member of her family. Her dog named Harold makes friends with Bunnicula straight away but the cat Chester is a little bit scared of him and does not seem to be happy about a new pet.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: "When Alan ditches Gumball to do something more fun Gumball is desperate to track him down and make him pay for his betrayal. Gumball has through gritted teeth prepared a special dinner for Alan to apologise for the way he has treated him in the past. When Alan cancels he is overjoyed until a post on Elmore Plus reveals Alan lied about his Mom being sick and is having a day of fun with his family instead. Gumball tracks down the traitor to give him a piece of his mind but when he finds out his Mom really is sick he has to find a way to make it up to him.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: "When Alan ditches Gumball to do something more fun Gumball is desperate to track him down and make him pay for his betrayal. Gumball has through gritted teeth prepared a special dinner for Alan to apologise for the way he has treated him in the past. When Alan cancels he is overjoyed until a post on Elmore Plus reveals Alan lied about his Mom being sick and is having a day of fun with his family instead. Gumball tracks down the traitor to give him a piece of his mind but when he finds out his Mom really is sick he has to find a way to make it up to him.

programme.title: Quest Means Business
programme.desc: Hes not messing around: Richard Quest presents his hot takes on the biggest breaking stories in the world of business. Watch for the expert analysis, commentary and opinions on the important headlines in the field from the notorious English journalist and CNN anchor. Joined by a cast of experts and correspondents delivering unrivaled facts and news, but also features and fascinating takes, figures and analysis on everything going down in the world of business.

programme.title: The Lead with Jake Tapper
programme.desc: News, politics and current affairs programme hosted by the award-winning, American journalist and author, Jake Tapper. Jake Tapper is the chief Washington correspondent for CNN and he will share his knowledge and insight into politics as well as covering a variety of other topics. This programme discusses a range of stories from topical events including national news, economics/finance, sports, health, technology and world affairs. The Lead with Jake Tapper has won a number of awards and accolades including three National Headliner Awards. Outside his work on television, Tapper has written for The New Yorker, The Washington Post and the Los Angeles Times as well as publishing his first novel, a political thriller.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: The Brief with Jim Sciutto
programme.desc: The best of CNNs reporting from correspondents across the world, to guide global audiences through the fast-paced news cycle with insight, analysis and hard-hitting interviews.

programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Hosted by Erin Burnett, an expert in political science and economics, OutFront is an hour-long news programme examining the latest stories from the US and further afield. Broadcast live from either the New York studio or live on location from the site of a breaking story, the show features insightful opinions from informed guests. With expert analysis from CNNs correspondents and analysis from the shows panel, Erin Burnett OutFront dissects the stories of the day, leaving no stone unturned. Burnett, a former financial analyst for Goldman Sachs, uses her forthright approach to engage interviewees in honest discussion.

programme.title: Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper delves into the days news, looking beyond the broadcast to give his take, prompting us to re-think what we hear in the headlines. Cooper has covered major, international stories like the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina on the Gulf Coast, the catastrophic BP oil spill and the 2010 earthquake in Haiti, which saw the whole world fall silent. The show has won an absolute plethora of awards over the years, including GLAAD Media and Emmy awards.

programme.title: The Source with Kaitlan Collins
programme.desc: Kaitlan Collins goes straight to the source for the best reporting on the days biggest stories.

programme.title: CNN NewsNight
programme.desc: Abby Phillip leads a roundtable discussion on the days biggest stories and issues shaping our world.

programme.title: Laura Coates Live
programme.desc: Laura Coates goes inside the story with a relentless pursuit of the facts.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.
