High Speed Chase
programme.desc: Officers chase down two suspects with an assault rifle who are intent on shooting their way out. A terrifying pursuit results in multiple casualties.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: American reality series is about Alaskan pioneers Yule and Ruth Kilcher and their kids living together at their homestead. The Kilchers demonstrate one-of-a-kind model of surviving in severe conditions of the last frontier. Enjoy amazing panorama views of Alaska, showing its various nature. Sitting in a comfortable chair in your warm apartment just try to imagine how it really is when electricity and running water is not inevitable fact of life. The Kilchers hunt, go fishing, garden, gather, raise livestock in order to survive Alaskas uncontrollable power and wilderness.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Misfit Garage
programme.desc: Misfit Garage is a reality TV show, a spin off from Fast N Loud. It features two of the mechanics fired from that shows Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage, Tom Smith and Jordan Butler, as well as Thomas Weeks and Scot McMillan, who together start a new company, Fired Up Garage. The crew run into former co-workers of the shop they were all fired from by Richard Rawlings and who they later find out is their new shop landlord. It takes a lot of courage to face the problems from the past and deal with the challenging present, but this is exactly what the guys do.

programme.title: Gold Rush: White Water
programme.desc: Reality series, a spin-off of Gold Rush, that follows gold miners Dustin Hurt and his father "Dakota" Fred Hurt, who put together a team of divers, mountaineers and bush mechanics and return to McKinley Creek in Haines Borough, Alaska, in order to find fortune in its raging and freezing waters. Nothing can stop these guys and to achieve their goal, they use suction dredge diving - sucking through a long tube like vacuum cleaners, where one wrong move could have deadly consequences.

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Join the group of miners on their quest to find gold in the waters of Nome in Alaska. This reality show follows crews on boats equipped with different gadgets for gold mining- typically consisting of a sluicing apparatus, a means of paydirt collection (dredge) and a cold-water-diving life support system. With many aggravating circumstances such as rough seas, poor underwater visibility, personnel issues, ocean-damaging equipment failures and more, these tough and high tempered people risk their lives every day in hopes of finding gold and getting the big payout.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers

The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Mike Brewers World of Cars
programme.desc: Car trader and vehicle fanatic Mike Brewer travels Britain and the United States looking for expert craftsmen in this automotive documentary series. He meets with diverse individuals who share his passion for finding, building, and most importantly, driving cars. Adding various pit stops to his jam-packed journey, including breweries, distilleries, and eateries, Mike gets stuck into the American way of life. Whether its learning more about the birth of NASCAR in Charlotte, North Carolina, meeting with the king of custom builds Gene Winfield, or seeing the work of British Motor Heritage who produce key components for Minis and MGs, each leg of his adventure is full of creative characters and superb cars.

programme.title: Ant Anstead Master Mechanic
programme.desc: To say expert British mechanic Ant Anstead is a lover of cars would be an understatement. The term petrol head does not quite cover the passion he exudes for motor vehicles. One of the vehicles that Ant has a particular obsession with is the 1930s Alfa Romeo 158 Grand Prix race car, one of the greatest racers ever made, which he is honouring in this documentary series by building his own from scratch. We follow Ant and his Alfa on their journey from workshop to race circuit, as he overcomes challenges, setbacks and deadlines to get this commemorative racer ready in time.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: As the modern world becomes progressively automated and mechanised its easy to become detached from how things are made and how they work. The hit series returns to uncover the miraculous feats of engineering which underpin life in the 21st century. How the seemingly mundane are often the result of highly sophisticated engineering and production processes. This fascinating behind-the-scenes journey delves deep into the production of everyday modern items from surfboards to satchels and trombones to cricket bats.

programme.title: Shed and Buried
programme.desc: Motorbike enthusiast Henry Cole and expert Sam Lovegrove travel around the UK to explore peoples sheds searching for some automotive bargains. They purchase all kinds of old cars, bikes, jeeps, tractors and other vehicles in order to renovate them and sell after the rehabilitation work is over. The old vehicles are restored and given second life. It is a risky business and the two always wonder if they manage to make profit this time.

programme.title: Shed and Buried
programme.desc: Motorbike enthusiast Henry Cole and expert Sam Lovegrove travel around the UK to explore peoples sheds searching for some automotive bargains. They purchase all kinds of old cars, bikes, jeeps, tractors and other vehicles in order to renovate them and sell after the rehabilitation work is over. programme.title: Scrappers
programme.desc: Discovery. Whether they take down a wall, dismantle a bomb or transport a plane to shred it, these Polish businessmen can make serious money from the tough job of scrapping metal.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers: Dream Car
programme.desc: Join our hosts, expert car dealer Mike Brewer and ex-Formula 1 mechanic Marc Elvis Priestly, as they try to negotiate the best deals when buying, transforming and selling cars, vans and motorcycles. Their goal is to help out unlucky petrolheads who want to trade up to get their dream car and Mike and Marc only have five deals to earn enough funds to mak the final purchase. Episodes see the duo trading up to an iconic Series 2A Land Rover for ex-soldier, Tony; making enough cash to buy a classic Mk2 Ford Escort for office manager, Chris; turning a decrepit Fiat Doblo into a mini-camper; and finding the original hot-hatch, a Golf GTi, for teaching assistant, Jess.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: As the modern world becomes progressively automated and mechanised its easy to become detached from how things are made and how they work. programme.title: Bitchin Rides
programme.desc: Bitchin Rides is a reality styled TV show hosted by Dave Kindig from the Salt Lake City, Utah-based company Kindig It Designs. Daves real passion is designing and building custom cars. We watch the process of restoring and rebuilding all types and all periods of cars. In each episode Dave and his team review a car, create a design, then the team takes it apart and rebuilds to create a one-of-a-kind gem. Things get really ugly before they get pretty. Dave has the best team of top mechanics, technicians and fabricators in the business, quality is their only focus when they create the baddest bitchin rides.

programme.title: Twin Turbos
programme.desc: Reality show that follows father and son duo Doug and Brad DeBerti who create one-of-a-kind custom cars and trucks for DeBerti Designs, their own firm, based in Arroyo Grande. Viewers will have a chance to see some high-profile projects such as a truck modeled after a fighter jet, the first ever drift-racing truck, a classic van transformed into a hot rod racing machine and many more cool projects. Besides building and customizing vehicles, Brad has another dream - to become a NASCAR driver, which he will try to do with the help from his mentor, NASCAR driver Joey Logano.

programme.title: Fast n Loud
programme.desc: Fast N Loud is a reality styled TV show featuring Richard Rawlings and his crew from the Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage. For most people old rusty cars in garages or open spaces are nothing but junk, but not for these guys. For them it is a perfect chance to reconstruct such vehicles and make some money. The old run-down cars are restored flawlessly and are able to run steadily for the next 10 years for sure. Richard and his crew work really hard to make a name for themselves and have become a huge success thanks to their enormous talents.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Freddy Dodges Mine Rescue
programme.desc: Mining veteran Freddy Dodge teams up with expert mechanic Juan Ibarra to help struggling mine owners with their failing operations. The pair come to the rescue sharing useful advice, practical knowledge and exclusive gold recovery techniques to transform the operations that could change the lives the mine owners forever.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Freddy Dodges Mine Rescue
programme.desc: Mining veteran Freddy Dodge teams up with expert mechanic Juan Ibarra to help struggling mine owners with their failing operations. The pair come to the rescue sharing useful advice, practical knowledge and exclusive gold recovery techniques to transform the operations that could change the lives the mine owners forever.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Did you know that Australia accounts for over 95% of the worlds supply of opal? Well, these miners do, and in this documentary series we follow groups of brave and persevering souls as they scour the land in search of the precious and highly valuable gemstone. With many of the mines located in the desolately deserted Outback, the crews must face some of Australias most treacherous landscapes if they are to hit the jackpot. The six crews have to weigh up the consequences in these old and hazardous mines, often risking their lives in search of opal wealth, not to mention preventing opportunistic thieves from snatching their hauls.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: A documentary chronicling real life the adventures of one of the most deadliest professions in the world. Follow Alaskan crab fishermen as they face 40-foot waves and intense discomfort with freezing temperatures as they fish in the Bering sea. Sacrificing tooth and nail to catch the seasonal delicacies to later sell and trade on land. Witness the dangers these fisher men face as they battle against the sea, and experience how caution is a crucial part of staying alive.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: This reality TV show follows Marty Raney and his two children, Matt Raney and Misty Bilodeau, who are successful homesteaders from the state of Alaska and have the skills needed to fish, hunt, raise livestock, and otherwise survive in an untamed landscape. Struggling homesteaders across the country call these experts to help them save their homesteads and become self-sufficient while they teach them the necessary skills to survive the wilderness.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: American reality series is about Alaskan pioneers Yule and Ruth Kilcher and their kids living together at their homestead. The Kilchers demonstrate one-of-a-kind model of surviving in severe conditions of the last frontier. Enjoy amazing panorama views of Alaska, showing its various nature. Sitting in a comfortable chair in your warm apartment just try to imagine how it really is when electricity and running water is not inevitable fact of life. The Kilchers hunt, go fishing, garden, gather, raise livestock in order to survive Alaskas uncontrollable power and wilderness.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Misfit Garage
programme.desc: Misfit Garage is a reality TV show, a spin off from Fast N Loud. It features two of the mechanics fired from that shows Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage, Tom Smith and Jordan Butler, as well as Thomas Weeks and Scot McMillan, who together start a new company, Fired Up Garage. The crew run into former co-workers of the shop they were all fired from by Richard Rawlings and who they later find out is their new shop landlord. It takes a lot of courage to face the problems from the past and deal with the challenging present, but this is exactly what the guys do.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: This reality TV show follows Marty Raney and his two children, Matt Raney and Misty Bilodeau, who are successful homesteaders from the state of Alaska and have the skills needed to fish, hunt, raise livestock, and otherwise survive in an untamed landscape. Struggling homesteaders across the country call these experts to help them save their homesteads and become self-sufficient while they teach them the necessary skills to survive the wilderness.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: The Clintons and the Obamas: The Secret Story of a Rivalry
programme.desc: Watch these four charismatic figures and bigger than life characters evolve over a decade at the forefront of the US political scene. These two utterly Mediatic couples united in marriage and politics for better or worse, offer a fascinating reflection of our times. Their story is one of a gigantic game of chess combining love, betrayal, power and money.

programme.title: Alexander the Great, the Macedonian
programme.desc: A close look at Alexander the Great - from Macedonia to India. Alexander the Great has always enjoyed a unique status in history. To the Greeks and Romans, he was a hero, to the Arabs, he was a prophet, to Westerners, he is a myth. Alexander the Great spread Greek civilisation single-handedly throughout the ancient world, as far as the borders of India, by relentlessly pursuing his sworn enemy Darius the Great, King of Persia. But what remains today of the "real" Alexander? Of his life and environment? Through the many depictions of the hero and the archaeological traces of his triumphant conquest, this film portrays the legendary figure, who has always been, and continues to be, a great source of inspiration, even for artists of today.

programme.title: Paris - Berlin: Shapes and Shades of History
programme.desc: Paris and Berlin have developed and grown facing each other over four centuries of tumultuous historical relationships and mutual admiration. The architecture and urbanism bear witness of this complex and rich confrontation.

programme.title: The Day When...
programme.desc: They are the men who are making History. In a time of crisis or war, any personal decision by any national leader can change everything. Like a 24h thriller, through archives and historical reconstitutions, live the day when great individual choices provoked great twists in the course of the conflict. Episodes : Churchill, De Gaulle, Roosevelt, Hitler and Staline

programme.title: Stolen Treasures
programme.desc: Its the biggest museum in the world…the museum of artworks stolen over the centuries and never rediscovered. These works haunt the nightmares of their owners, and occupy the days of hundreds of police officers across the world, as well as those of a handful of private agencies; no country or museum of importance can claim to have been spared. According to Interpol, art theft is the fourth largest criminal trade, after the drug trade, the weapons trade and money laundering. How could it be otherwise, when the soaring price of art propels the value of some paintings into the tens of millions of Euros? This world appears to be full of mysteries. Crime syndicates rub shoulders with petty criminals and the police care more about recovering the items than they do about arresting the perpetrators.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: As warfare has evolved, many military techniques and technologies have been adapted for use in urban settings by police units around the world. This episode provides viewers with an intimate perspective on what it feels like to be "inside the heads" of special police personnel, and how their use of military-style strategies and equipment allows them to save lives. From riot control in South Africa and the lessons learned from its excesses, to Los Angeles Police Chief Robert Gates creation of an elite police S.W.A.T team, CQB will showcase how, over the past 30 years, the fight against urban crime has evolved into a military scenario, with both sides using increasingly complex weaponry and tactics.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We set sail to the land of the Norseman in Oslo, Norway. Well climb the fort walls at Akershus Fortress and discover the North and South Poles at the Fram Museum. Then, well unearth ancient viking ship treasures at the Viking Ship Museum, and well brave the open waters of the Pacific with Thor Heyerdahl at the Kon-tiki museum.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters continue their investigation of Knutsford Crown Court. As they delve deeper into the building, will the ghosts and spirits make contact through Derek?

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Carnfield Hall is a country house dating from the 15th and 16th Centuries. This private residence turn event hall is using its paranormal activity to draw in business. Are these spirits the old residents?

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Weve got our own private Idaho in Boise. Well tour one of the most stunning buildings in the frontier west at the Idaho State Capitol, dance all night with the Basques at the Basque museum and cultural center, soar to new heights at the Warhawk Air Museum in Nampa, and get a shiver down our spines at the Idaho state penitentiary.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Nairobi is the capital of Kenya and one of the most fascinating cities in Africa. On our visit well see the colonial architecture of a bygone era and the ultra-modern side of town as well. Well learn the truth behind the "Out of Africa" story and our host gets eye-to-eye with some endangered giraffes.

programme.title: Journeys In India
programme.desc: The people and wildlife of the western state of Gujarat have found ways to survive in an inhospitable environment. Unique big game exists side-by-side with some of the most talented and unique craftsman in the world. Bill gets the inside scoop on this strange land and is doubly surprised by his local guide.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: Between the sea and the desert. Thats the fine line we travel on this trip to Egypt. To the south of Hurghada, on the Red Sea, there is a desert peninsula called Soma Bay, which were going to explore. We start with a fun quad bike safari, that takes us towards the arid and rocky hinterland. Finally we arrive at a Bedouin village, hidden among the mountains. We then return to the coast, in order to discover Soma Bays other side, made up of oasis and luxury. There, you can enjoy every benefit from the sea. For example, in the Thalassic spa, in the quiet and relaxed atmosphere, or in the Soma Bay Kite House, where active people can enjoy kitesurf. We also want to appreciate, in the best possible way, the outstanding beauty of this sea, so we dive down into its depths, to be among the star fish and corals, Butterfly fish and Moray eels, sea turtles and Clown fish.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: Adventures in Tanzania. On board of a little Cessna plane, we reach the Songo Songo archipelago, 50 km south from Mafia. Its from here that, after 30 minutes of navigation, we arrive in our final destination: Fan Jove, an island in the middle of nowhere, once inhabited by sea nomads and today the realm of an eco-lodge. Surrounded by a 11km reef rich in fishes, birds and a lighthouse built by the Germans in 1894, Fan Jove is a real paradise in the middle of the Indian Ocean, that Malcolm Italian biologist who loves Africa, wants to show us in every magical detail.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Marvel at the site of Americas most famous water dam. Well learn about how the Hoover Dam was built, why its necessary, and take a behind the scenes look at its inner workings.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Americas military history is on display on the decks of the USS North Carolina. Then we visit the historic Confederate Fort Fisher civil war museum and learn about the Carolinas role in the civil war.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: Males and females of most species will fight viciously in self-defense. And females, can be even more aggressive than males when defending their young. In this episode well explore the Race of Life from the point of view of food, territory, social status, and mates. Though some fights occur between two different species, most battles are fought between members of the same species. Though the wildlife warriors in these battles usually are not trying to kill each other, the fighting can result in death. Why would members of the same species fight with such ferocity? Food is one reason. Animals that store and horde food for survival will aggressively protect their pantries. Animals are also willing to fight to protect their food indirectly. For example, predators will defend a territory that provides them with enough prey, or food, to survive. This territorial aggression serves to space out members of a species across their range in a way that maintains sufficient food within each territory. But it also may limit population size. For example, if a pack of wolves cannot find, defend, or take over a suitable territory, the members may starve to death. Though food, territory, social status, and mates may be won and kept by fighting, aggression takes its toll. Animal combatants face exhaustion, injuries, time away from resting and eating, and the ultimate cost of battle: death. Thus, just like human beings, its often in an animals interest to win a war before it ever begins - or to avoid confrontation altogether.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Our seafaring nature has translated well to the space age, seeking to sail out into the unknown in search of riches of one kind or another. While Europe and Asia continue their interest in the resource rich Moon, The United States and NASA have set their sights on nothing less than manned missions to Mars. Can they manage to go shore to shore on the most dangerous of unknown seas, deep space.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after youve lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Organic Panic
programme.desc: Enjoying food and friends with a glass of wine is one of lifes great pleasures. Doctors say that consuming a small amount every day is good for your health. Environmental activists and organic wine producers caution that conventional wine is filled with harmful pesticides and that the fertilisers, fungicides and other chemicals used to produce it are disastrous for the environment. Aspiring chefs and restaurateurs Marida Mohammed (MasterChef) and her twin sister, Narida, get advice from celebrity chef and sommelier Vikram Vij, about how to select and appreciate wine and why they shouldnt worry too much about purported health threats. Marida and Narida then tour Niagara vineyards and compare super-‐organic, biodynamic wine with its conventional counterpart. Ann Sperling of Southbrook Vineyards combines cosmic forces with organic farming to produce wine she calls the purest expression of the grape that is good for the people who drink it and the planet as a whole. French winemaker JL Groux of Stratus Vineyards and George Soleas, the Vice President of the LCBO argue that conventional wine is delicious and safe for both you and the environment. Which one will the sisters choose?

programme.title: Big Coast
programme.desc: Chasing down Albacore Tuna 65 miles off West Coast Vancouver Island.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Brazils Coastlines
programme.desc: A series to celebrate Brazil and its diversity. We will explore the beauty and richness of the 8000 kilometer-long coasts, focusing on their natural and geographical aspects but also on its economic and cultural facets. An exciting journey blending the best aerial shots with stunning photography across the country to reveal both a cultural and human portrait.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: From the beginnings of our Solar System four and half billion years ago there remains tantalizing clues to its evolution; remnent debris: asteroids and comets. They vary in size from grains of dust to mountain sides, footballs to planetoids. They were the building blocks of the planets and perhaps carry the origins of life itself. Now within our grasp these rocks of ice and dust are ready to give up their secrets.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: It has fired our imaginations for millennia, Mars, the God of War and the source of Mans science fictional demise. We know the dry barren planet was once flowing with vast reservoirs of water, the sky thick and filled with clouds and the tantalizing possibility of life. It is the only other place in our solar system than Man might one day call home.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Cheetah: The Price Of Speed
programme.desc: The cheetah is a highly specialised animal. It excels at one thing alone, running down high-speed prey faster than any other mammal on earth.But this specialisation comes at a cost. The cheetah as a predatory model seems focussed on one single area of expertise. Outside of pursuing prey, how effective is this animal when compared to the other apex predators of the savannah?Alongside lions, leopards, vultures and hyenas how does the cheetah fit into the efficient cogs of the savannah system? Can it compete, or is it an outsider, cornered by its own specialisation?The primary character in the story is a cheetah mother, who goes about her daily life, hunting for her three cubs. Her trials and tribulations highlight the refined hunting system of the cheetah, but they also shed light on her weaknesses, and the lack of robustness in the species itself.

programme.title: The Tigers From Scotland
programme.desc: Narrated by Iain Glen, this film focuses on the fragile existence of the Scottish Wildcats, their status and what conservation efforts are being undertaken to ensure their survival.

programme.title: Leopards of Dead Tree Island
programme.desc: "Leopards of Dead Tree Island" (1 x 52) takes us on an unforgettable HD journey into the lives of these three cats: Mosweo - a young mother who gave birth to two cubs during the abundance of summer. She is solitary by nature and takes on parenthood alone. Will she be able to rear and defend her cubs in this challenging environment - competing with lions and hyenas and coping with floods and drought? Buddah is the dominant male leopard of Dead Tree Island. He is the father of Mosweos cubs but he offers her no support or protection. To further complicate matters Tipa, her previous offspring, still shares her same territory, competing for food and posing a threat to her new cubs. He is now an independent three year old moving dangerously close to his mothers new den site. He is an insider that she has tolerated so far. But, with the arrival of her new set of cubs hes become an adversary that needs to be dealt with. Tipa also remains within his fathers territory. Buddahs heavy frame and mauled ears allude to his age and stature. He moves through Dead Tree island with confidence and entitlement, fighting off his most irritating of rivals - baboons. Tipas efforts to hunt and assert his own authority are clumsy and naïve in comparison. The island covers the natural hunting grounds of all these secretive cats, they are drawn together by circumstances beyond their control leading to tension, drama and ultimately tragedy. Mosweo loses one cub to a predator and then finds the last of her litter paralyzed and dying. She tries everything in her power to comfort and revive her doomed offspring - but to no avail. Mosweos is forced out of Dead Tree island when Buddahs attention strays towards an exciting new scent. A new, stronger female has made her way into his territory and Mosweo tries desperately to divert his attention away from this new rival. But the new female is in estrus and mates with Buddah, thereby cementing her own place among the group of leopards at Dead Tree Island. The contrasting environments of the Okavango Delta provide a uniquely beautiful backdrop as this drama unfolds among the Leopards of Dead Tree Island.

programme.title: Coral Sea Dreaming
programme.desc: Coral Sea Dreaming enters into the very heart of life - and death - on a coral reef. It is a story that spans 500 million years and stars some of the most exotic and wonderous marine creatures on earth. Coral is the planets greatest natu- ral architect, and coral reefs boast the highest biodiversity of any ecosystem.

programme.title: Speed Kills
programme.desc: In the forests dark underworld, theres a lot more happening than meets the eye. Under every rock, behind every tree, death could be lurking.Africas largest cobra is beat to the chase by the Giant bullfrog. Big Brown Bats use sonar to take out Wax moths at high speed. And the worlds 2nd fastest cat leaps 10 feet into the air after its aerial prey.When death comes to the underworld, it takes the express!

programme.title: Africas Deadliest
programme.desc: A national Geographic documentary looking into the deadliest animals that roam Africa. Examining animals that have evolved complex weapons from teeth to claws and agility so that they can protect themselves and battle effectively. From elephant tusks that can defend or attack to the fur, speed and agility of seals. Showing how these animals have exceptional skills and power alongside their body features that have developed into ideal tools for their needs.

programme.title: Africas Deadliest
programme.desc: A national Geographic documentary looking into the deadliest animals that roam Africa. Examining animals that have evolved complex weapons from teeth to claws and agility so that they can protect themselves and battle effectively. From elephant tusks that can defend or attack to the fur, speed and agility of seals. Showing how these animals have exceptional skills and power alongside their body features that have developed into ideal tools for their needs.

programme.title: A Year in the Wild
programme.desc: It is April, and large groups of blacktip and tiger sharks are gathering off the South African Coast. They are waiting for the onset of one of natures most spectacular mass migrations: the annual sardine run. Like the cold ocean current that gives rise to the extraordinary numbers of African pilchards and their predators during the Sardine Run, the frigid Benguela current that runs northwards along the arid coastline of Namibia also supports a remarkable diversity of life. Monk parakeets are highly sociable, quirky South American parrots, but unlike all other parrots, they build complex nesting structures that can reach the size of a car, with individual compartments for each nesting pair. South American parakeets arent the only birds turned architects: the social weaver birds of southern Africa also construct permanent nests on trees, large enough to house dozens of bird families, often stretching across several generations at a time. Like the weaverbirds, bats, too, tend to roost in large numbers. At this time of year, mothers and their young form part of the colony, with the young clinging closely to the front of their mothers until there are weaned at 6 months of age. In the Thong Pha Phoom National Park in Thailand, a pair of greater coucals have built a nest and laid a clutch of 4 eggs. By now, massive shoals of around 10 million Southern African Pilchards have gathered in the coastal waters of South Africa and begun their migration northwards. Like the dolphins during the Sardine Run, lions tend to work in teams when hunting large prey like buffalo. And right now, the need for the Xakanaxa pride to hunt and provide for their expanding family is greater than ever: they have new cubs to feed. A group of meerkats in South Africa is also busily caring for their growing family. Most of the clan has already left the family burrow to forage for insects and other small prey. In the Okavango Deltas grassland, a pair of puff adders is engaged in a lengthy mating ritual.

programme.title: What In the World

programme.title: Music Voyager

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: After the fall of the soviet union many countries remained in dispute in the early nineties despite eastern Europes independence. In 1994 a bitter conflict broke out between the forces of the Chechnen independence movement and the Russian regular army. Despite overwhelming manpower, weaponry and air support, the Russian forces were unable to establish effective permanent control over the mountainous area due to many successful Chechen guerrilla raids. Improvised Explosive Devices were one of the most effective methods employed in these disastrous raids and were the back drop to many Close Quarter Battle scenarios exchanged between the two sides.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Get your kicks on Route 66 in Flagstaff, AZ. Duck and cover! Were headed to the famous Barringer meteor crater outside of town. Then we scan the stars for heavenly bodies at Lowell Observatory. Well learn the history of the region at the Northern Arizona History Museum, and finally swing from their many ponderosa pines at Flagstaff Extreme adventure park.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters travel to Stockport and investigate an abandoned Mil, Weir Mill, said to the most haunted Mill in the UK. Demonic figures haunt anyone that enters. Will the team survive the night with the spirits?

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: The team head to Tutbury Castle in Derbyshire to investigate the paranormal reports at the location. Past Hunters appear to have caught the Tutbury Ghost on camera.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Travel Thru History is an Emmy-nominated, un-hosted lifestyle/travel series designed to spark interest and enthusiasm in viewers about our worlds rich and fascinating history by traveling to diverse locales across the globe. Locations include New Orleans, Las Vegas, Oslo, Belize, Dublin and more. In this episode we visit the Kennedy Space Center located on Floridas famous "Space Coast." Well speak to NASA engineers about the past, present and future of American space travel, as well as take a look at the attractions KSC has to offer.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: This is definitely the land of the elephant. Large herds of pachyderms roam this marshy park putting on a show for whoever wants to watch. But thats not the only big boys of this park—buffalo, lion and a host of hoofed game make this a wonder to behold.

programme.title: Journeys In India
programme.desc: Two of the most sacred places in India are featured in this fascinating episode. Bill first burst the myths surrounding the legendary Khajuraho and its intricately carved temples before heading to the Holy City of Varanasi. Varanasi, the Jerusalem or Mecca for Hindus with its deep connection to the Ganges River, is explored with an insiders perspective.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: Were in Messinia, looking out over the Mediterranean Sea. Here we find the beautiful Navarino Coast, with its rich vegetation, historically important archeological sites and breath-taking beaches. With its rich variety of flora and fauna, the Navarino Coast is a small eco-friendly paradise, but it is also the ideal place for scientific research. In the waters surrounding Sfaktiria Island, we manage to see the Loggerhead sea turtle, now in danger of extinction. Afterwards on dry land, we then get to go and discover another important heritage of this region: the culinary tradition, with its typical dishes, such as " Hylopites", and the famous Greek coffee.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: Between the sea and the desert. Thats the fine line we travel on this trip to Egypt. To the south of Hurghada, on the Red Sea, there is a desert peninsula called Soma Bay, which were going to explore. We start with a fun quad bike safari, that takes us towards the arid and rocky hinterland. Finally we arrive at a Bedouin village, hidden among the mountains. We then return to the coast, in order to discover Soma Bays other side, made up of oasis and luxury. There, you can enjoy every benefit from the sea. For example, in the Thalassic spa, in the quiet and relaxed atmosphere, or in the Soma Bay Kite House, where active people can enjoy kitesurf. We also want to appreciate, in the best possible way, the outstanding beauty of this sea, so we dive down into its depths, to be among the star fish and corals, Butterfly fish and Moray eels, sea turtles and Clown fish.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: The city of brotherly love does not disappoint history lovers. We visit Independence hall, the liberty bell, Elfreths alley, the Philadelphia Museum of Art, and get creeped out at Americas first penitentiary, Eastern State.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: The live music capital of the US has an interesting past. Take an in depth look at one of Austins oldest hotels, The Driskill. Then well learn about Texan independence in the Bob Bullock History museum. Finally, well end up at one of Austins most historic buildings, the Texas state capitol.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: With predators practically always on the lookout for a meal, prey must constantly avoid being eaten. Any defensive adaptation that prey can utilize adds to the chances of survival for its species. Some adaptations are defense mechanisms which can give the prey an advantage against their enemies. The first is very direct and comes naturally. Animals can use speed as a very effective means of escaping predators. In the evolutionary history of big herbivores and the carnivores that prey upon them, the phrase "arms race"is only technically a metaphor. Antelope are literally born to run, and many of the things that chase them, such as the cheetah, are either masters of endurance or champion sprinters. The evolutionary story almost writes itself: over millions of years of chasing, and being chased, wherever predators evolved to move quickly, their prey were selected to run even faster. Except of course theres more to life than running for your life. An antelopes frame is under more demands than evading cheetahs—it also needs to travel long distances to follow food availability with the shifting rainy season. The ostrich meanwhile stands at one extreme of bird evolution, for although unable to fly, of all the birds the ostrich runs the fastest race of life. More peculiar still is the Golden Wheel spider, the only creature known to turn itself into a wheel in order to get away from trouble. There are many ways to win the race, when the goal is always survival.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: As the latest successes and failures come and go Mars continues to give up her secrets. Invisible clouds are revealed with ultraviolet light and the search for the source of methane continues with ExoMars. As we prepare to land humans on the red planet, getting there is one thing; staying long term is another, can we really conquor this planet?

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after youve lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: Organic Panic
programme.desc: Fun in the sun and relaxing on the beach are nourishing for the spirit. But is your vacation ruining the earth? Actress and model Angela Asher travels to tropical Costa Rica to find out if luxury can be sustainable. She visits Lapa Rios, a gorgeous eco-‐lodge perched in the Costa Rican rainforest, to learn about how they incorporate organic and sustainable principals into an indulgent getaway - a truly organic vacation. At the Los Sueños Marriott resort near Jaco Beach, Costa Rica, she is introduced to the methods modern resorts use to conserve water and energy while providing a five-‐star experience. While not organic per se, the Marriott insists that their green practices have a much larger positive impact on the planet when compared to those of any (smaller) eco lodge

programme.title: Big Coast
programme.desc: Annual brood stock fishery from Percy Walkus Hatchery in Wuikinuxv, Rivers Inlet...conserving the largest Chinook on Earth!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Beyond the asteroid belt lay the ice giants, some can be seen with the naked eye, others only glimpsed once by a passing probe. We are again sending cameras to the edge of the solar system giving us new insights into the evolution of our worlds.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: Perception and Reality: The Magic of Science
programme.desc: Our film follows researchers who are bringing magicians tricks into the laboratory. With impossible magic, amazing facts, and opportunities for viewers to participate in the magic tricks, this extraordinary exploration peeks behind the curtain into a fascinating world where ancient magic meets modern science. Magician Julie Eng not only mystifies us with magic, she also takes us to Montreals McGill University to meet Jay Olson who is using card tricks to study consciousness. His research also includes an MRI machine that can apparently not only read minds, but also manipulate thoughts. In the US we meet with professor Anthony Barnhart. Hes a magician turned scientist who is using magic principles to investigate why we sometimes dont see whats right under our noses. We also meet Professor Amory Danek who is using the conjurors craft to study creativity and problem solving.Professor Ronald Rensink at the University of British Columbia discovered how small distractions can blind drivers to obvious dangers. These studies naturally led him to work with magicians to explore possible new experiments.In London England Gustav Kuhn conducts a study that tracks the eye movements of the magicians audience. We see tricks that fool us despite nothing actually happening, as well as demonstrations that reveal we can be blind even to our own choices. Colourful and compelling, our film takes a critical and engaging look at the fascinating facts revealed when you see the human mind through the eyes of a magician.

programme.title: Zenith - Advances In Space Exploration
programme.desc: Zenith - Advances in Space Exploration reveals these latest developments and the implications they hold for all of us.

programme.title: Zenith - Advances In Space Exploration
programme.desc: Zenith - Advances in Space Exploration reveals these latest developments and the implications they hold for all of us.

programme.title: A Counter History Of Internet
programme.desc: A look back at the emergence of Internet freedom defence movements that have sprung up in reaction to growing regulation of the Web by governments and multinationals. Internet was created by hippies while being funded by the military! This improbable culture shock gave birth to an area of freedom that was impossible to censor or control. Yet for years, that is precisely what a certain number of political leaders have sought to do, prompting hackers and defenders of freedom to enter the political arena.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Some of the proof of Einsteins theories had long been elusive, beyond the capabilities of technology, until now. It appears that Einstein is once again triumphant with the latest in deep space observations.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Cubesats the tiny Satellites are growing in main stream popularity, they have even been sent to Mars with the Insight Mission.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Were looking hard, but the numbers arent stacking up, is life on other planets that hard to find? Even signals from an advanced race elude us. Maybe we really are alone in our neck of the galaxy!

programme.title: Water: H2O Stories
programme.desc: Water: H2O Stories is a 3x52 series revisiting the story of water on planet Earth and its disrupted course over time which has led to the 21st century biggest challenge.

programme.title: Natures Force
programme.desc: How are Rainbows formed and whats their science? We look at the largest Hail ever recorded and explain why it comes in so many shapes and sizes. Global Warming is a big issue and topic, and we give a nutshell insight to its meaning and impact on many levels. Forecasting is key and crucial to living with nature and its weather, as it involves precision technologies and expertise. Typhoon Halyan is an example of one of the most devastating storms in recent history and its story illustrates the power and destruction that Typhoons can cause.

programme.title: Natures Force
programme.desc: Snow is a fascinating world of crystals that animals, plants, and humans have had to adapt to, in order to benefit from its best and survive its worst attributes. Some communities live with Tornadoes by building homes with survival features and rather than get out of their paths, they rely on warning systems and classifications. And behind all great weather events is Wind, find out how and why it can change from a gentle breeze into a devastating gale force and where does it go? Natures force can be mystical and puzzling and the Sunshower has been the subject of myths and legends and superstitions, but it does have a scientific explanation.

programme.title: Infestation
programme.desc: Forests are crucial for our survival on Earth. They absorb carbon dioxide from the atmosphere and supply all living forms with clean oxygen. "We are like a patient in a hospital bed that is turning down their oxygen tank and thinking they could live with a little bit less oxygen and meanwhile the CO2 is increasing in the room" says journalist Andrew Nikiforuk.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: The history of the British Empire colonial legacy in Northern Ireland is well known the world over but a there is a largely untold story of the the firefights between and close quarter battles exchanged between the provisional IRA, the British army and the elite SAS. Although the IRA often employed "terrorist" techniques within the city of london and on Englands mainland not much is said of the often guerilla warfare techniques of the British Special Air Service in Northern Ireland since the beginning of this conflict. In this episode we will examine how the history of the Special Air Service affected the training of every elite force after it and how the close quarter battles in Northern Ireland in the late 1970s through to the millennium shaped both special forces and resistance methods.

programme.desc: Jaunprecētā Lorēna Felpsa, cīnoties par savu dzīvību, tiek sadurta 123 reizes. Slepkava savā rīcībā vaino murgus un saaukstēšanās zāles.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Sieva apgalvo, ka viņa pamodusies, un tikai tad atklājusi, ka viņas vīrs ir nošauts, kaut arī viņa gulēja viņam blakus. Viņa neko neesot dzirdējusi vai redzējusi, bet policija to apšauba. Vai viņa ir šokēta un sērojoša atraitne vai viltīga slepkava ar slēptiem plāniem?

programme.title: Nāvīgās attiecības ar Feitu Dženkinu
programme.desc: Dino un Klāra Pantāzes veiksmīgi nodarbojas ar ķīlu biznesu, un viņu 20 gadus ilgā laulība šķietami ir ideāla. Kad Klāra mājās tiek nošauta, izmeklētāji prāto, vai vainīgs nav dusmīgs klients, vai arī viņu pasakā slēpjas kas vairāk.

programme.desc: Manipulatīva sieviete lūdz savam tēvam īstenot viltīgu plānu nogalināt savu bijušo vīru. Vai viņai izdosies pārspēt policiju un izvairīties no cietuma, kamēr tēvs dara viņas netīro darbu?

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Mācītāja dēli izdara nāves grēku mīlestības pret naudu dēļ. Tas šokē cieši saliedēto reliģisko kopienu Ziemeļkarolīnā.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Pazūd māte. Satriecoši novērošanas kameru video atklāj stāstu par viņas pēdējām stundām.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Kad sludinātāja sievaZiemeļkarolīnā tiek atrasta noslepkavota, policijai ir jānoskaidro ne tikai tas, kurš varētu vēlēties viņas nāvi, bet arī tas, vai daži draudzes locekļi sēro vai mēģina slēpt savu daļu vardarbīgajā noziegumā.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Pazudis dakteris Marks Veinbergers, un viņa sieva Mišela Krāmere nezina, kur viņš atrodas. Veinbergera stāsts ir tumšs un sagrozīts, saistīts ar alkatību un varu, un kas liek Mišelai izplūst asarās, bet pilsētai - dzīvot šausmās. Marks ir Amerikas visvairāk meklētais "aizbēgušais ārsts".

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Pēc šķiršanās un biznesa bankrota atriebīgs vīrietis nežēlīgi vajā personu, kas, viņaprāt, ir nodarījis pāri. Policijai jāizmanto neparasta taktika, lai palīdzētu nodrošināt šīs personas drošību.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Draugi Ņūorleānā ierodas pilsētā, meklējot jautru uzdzīvi. Līdz saullēktam viens no viņiem tiek atrasts miris izdegušas automašīnas bagāžniekā. Aizdomās turēti tiek visi, taču tieši upura vārdi galu galā palīdz atrast slepkavu.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Mācītāja dēli izdara nāves grēku mīlestības pret naudu dēļ. Tas šokē cieši saliedēto reliģisko kopienu Ziemeļkarolīnā.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Kamēr tiek atkāts Entonija noslēpums, Helēnai ar Durbina palīdzību jāpārvar veipošanas problēma.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Kamēr pārējā pilsēta gatavojas Toledo ikgadējā Keitijas Holmas dienas svinībām, Džeks un Marisa plāno sabojāt svētku konkursu.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sems un Džeimss dodas uz Ņujorku. Atrodoties tur, Sema saskaras ar atmiņām par to, kas viņa bija pirms atturības, un viņai jāizlemj, vai viņa var atkal riskēt kļūt par veco Semu. Olīvija un Stefānija sper svarīgu soli savā IVF ceļojumā.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Šajā atmiņu epizodē iereibis Džeimss Pateicības dienā bārā satiek piedzērušos "Katrīnu". Pēc izraidīšanas viņi abi sāk savas vienas nakts svētku svinības. Džeimsa laiks kopā ar Semu mudina viņu veikt izmaiņas.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Kamēr visi mēģina iejusties garās dienas garā, Liza un Dženna cīnās par interneta miljardieri, Džekam ir liela finansiāla neveiksme, un Treisijs mēģina iztērēt Benihana dāvanu karti, pirms tās termiņš ir beidzies.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Roberts ir atguvis spēku un ir kopā ar Eimiju. Bet kaut kas joprojām nav kārtībā.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Džordža un Mendijas kāzu plānos Mērija ir pretnostatīta Mendijas mammai, un pa vidu atrodas mazulis.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Džordža un Mendijas kāzas beidzot ir klāt, taču Mīmavas arests var satricināt lietas ģimenē.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Sezona sākās ar uzstādījumu, kas pazīstams daudziem Vidusrietumu studentiem: tornado treniņiem. Ideja izvairīties no tornado varenā spēka, pulcējoties gaitenī un cerot, ka tas jūs nepamanīs, ir potenciāls perfektiem kumēdiņiem.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeks liek skolēniem izveidot viltus kultu, lai sabotētu direktora Durbina jaunās skolas formas; Mērija, Stefa un Mišela gatavojas redzēt vienu no saviem iecienītākajiem māksliniekiem, kurš ieradies pilsētā.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Marijas dzimšanas dienā ģimene dodas uz Itāliju. Rejs saaukstējas un jūtas nelaimīgs. Roberts atrod savu sapņu sievieti. Bet - vispirms viņam jātiek pāri viņas tēvam.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Šovs Itālijā turpinās. Rejs sāk novērtēt Itāliju, un Robertam, ja viņš vēlas tikties rīt, ir jāizvairās no Stefānijas tēva.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls visu Skrentonas komandu aicina atbalstīt Kelliju un piedalīties Divali svinībās, kas ir hinduistu gaismas festivāls. Endijs pārliecina Džimu strādāšanu vēlu vakarā pārvērst dzeršanas spēlē.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Kad Džena atklāj Maiklam, ka Skrentonas filiāli slēgs, Maikls cenšas komandas garstāvokli uzturēt možu. Tikmēr kolēģi sāk spriest, kā šī rezultātā mainīsies viņu dzīves.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Lai slēptu savas attiecības ar Linu, Frenks pārliecina savu māti, ka satiekas ar Lizu. Treisijs un Dženna sadarbojas, lai mēģinātu atrisināt Pīta pazudušā viskija lietu. Tikmēr Džeks māca Kenetam, kā tikt galā ar savu pirmo biznesa ienaidnieku.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Džeks satiek savu vidusskolas vecuma ienaidnieku Keiliju Hūperi. Tikmēr Kenets saduras ar Lizu savā jaunajā darbā "Standards and Practices". Dženna atrod savus sešus bioloģiskos bērnus, cenšoties iegūt lielāku publicitāti.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Pēc pagrieziena punkta svinēšanas Sema nolemj, ka ir pienācis laiks izlīgt ar Kerolu. Kad cīņa ar Džoelu liek Britai pārdomāt nākotni, viņa pievēršas maz ticamam sabiedrotajam: Felīcijai. Tikmēr Džeimss slēpj destruktīvu noslēpumu.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Kāzu dienā Britas nervozitāte liek viņai pieņemt negaidītu lēmumu. Kerola un Bobs paceļ savas attiecības jaunā līmenī. Sema uzzina patiesību par Džeimsu un ir satricināta par to, kāda varētu būt viņas nākotne.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Šeldons mācās būt par Mīmavas advokātu - viņai tiek piemērots mājas arests. Kūperiem ir avārija santehnikas jomā.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Šeldona publicētais raksts izraisa satricinājumu augstskolu darbā. Džordžijs cenšas precīzāk runāt savas meitas priekšā.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Vampīri cenšas sarīkot greznus asins svētkus par godu sava senseja no Vecās zemes vizītei.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Vampīri iesaistās vietējā Steitenailendas politikā - tas ir viņu pirmais solis uz pasaules kundzību.

programme.desc: Kāzu dienā Britas nervozitāte liek viņai pieņemt negaidītu lēmumu. Kerola un Bobs paceļ savas attiecības jaunā līmenī. Sema uzzina patiesību par Džeimsu un ir satricināta par to, kāda varētu būt viņas nākotne.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Sezona sākās ar uzstādījumu, kas pazīstams daudziem Vidusrietumu studentiem: tornado treniņiem. Ideja izvairīties no tornado varenā spēka, pulcējoties gaitenī un cerot, ka tas jūs nepamanīs, ir potenciāls perfektiem kumēdiņiem.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeks liek skolēniem izveidot viltus kultu, lai sabotētu direktora Durbina jaunās skolas formas; Mērija, Stefa un Mišela gatavojas redzēt vienu no saviem iecienītākajiem māksliniekiem, kurš ieradies pilsētā.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls visu Skrentonas komandu aicina atbalstīt Kelliju un piedalīties Divali svinībās, kas ir hinduistu gaismas festivāls. Endijs pārliecina Džimu strādāšanu vēlu vakarā pārvērst dzeršanas spēlē.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Kad Džena atklāj Maiklam, ka Skrentonas filiāli slēgs, Maikls cenšas komandas garstāvokli uzturēt možu. Tikmēr kolēģi sāk spriest, kā šī rezultātā mainīsies viņu dzīves.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Lai slēptu savas attiecības ar Linu, Frenks pārliecina savu māti, ka satiekas ar Lizu. Treisijs un Dženna sadarbojas, lai mēģinātu atrisināt Pīta pazudušā viskija lietu. Tikmēr Džeks māca Kenetam, kā tikt galā ar savu pirmo biznesa ienaidnieku.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Džeks satiek savu vidusskolas vecuma ienaidnieku Keiliju Hūperi. Tikmēr Kenets saduras ar Lizu savā jaunajā darbā "Standards and Practices". Dženna atrod savus sešus bioloģiskos bērnus, cenšoties iegūt lielāku publicitāti.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Marijas dzimšanas dienā ģimene dodas uz Itāliju. Rejs saaukstējas un jūtas nelaimīgs. Roberts atrod savu sapņu sievieti. Bet - vispirms viņam jātiek pāri viņas tēvam.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Šovs Itālijā turpinās. Rejs sāk novērtēt Itāliju, un Robertam, ja viņš vēlas tikties rīt, ir jāizvairās no Stefānijas tēva.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Šeldons mācās būt par Mīmavas advokātu - viņai tiek piemērots mājas arests. Kūperiem ir avārija santehnikas jomā.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Šeldona publicētais raksts izraisa satricinājumu augstskolu darbā. Džordžijs cenšas precīzāk runāt savas meitas priekšā.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeks mēģina satuvināties ar puišiem darbā, uzaicinot viņus uz spēļu vakaru; Helēna palīdz direktoram Durbinam noturēt mugurkaulu; Stefa un Mērija mēģina iegūt no Mišelas informāciju par tiesas prāvu, kurā viņa bija zvērinātā.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: A.P. Bio studenti atkal apvieno Džeku ar viņa tēvu. Džeks plāno atriebties, mēģinot atmaskot savu it kā reformēto tēvu; ragana pareģo drūmu Mērijas, Stefas un Mišelas nākotni, kas sadala sievietes.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Marija un Frenks ar savu automašīnu ietriecas Reja mājā.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Roberts pastāsta Eimijai par Stefāniju, jo domā, ka viņiem ir lemts būt kopā. Vēl viena šķiršanās.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Džena informē Maiklu, ka Skrentonas filiāle tiks apvienota ar Stemfordu. Džims un Pema atkal apvienojas, kamēr pārējiem kolēģiem jāpielāgojas jaunienācējiem.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls uzzina, ka viens no jaunajiem Dunder Mifflin darbiniekiem ir ar kriminālu pagātni. Džims palīdz Endijam savaldzināt Pemu.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Deniss Lizas dzīvoklī ierodas Svētā Patrika dienā un iedzen ķīli starp Lizu un Krisu. Tikmēr Treisijs un Dženna cīnās par augstākajiem rezultātiem Svētā Patrika dienas parādē, un Džeks kopā ar rakstniekiem spēlē fantāzijas galda spēli.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liza cenšas būt par padomdevēju Heizelai, kura pieļauj katastrofālas kļūdas, rūpējoties par Treisiju - Kenetam par lielām šausmām. Tikmēr Džeks nolemj uzņemt TV filmu par Eiverijas nolaupīšanu, un Dženna izmisīgi cenšas iegūt galveno lomu.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Pirmo reizi mūžā ar jaunu darbu un jaunu potenciālu mīlestības interesi Sema uzskata, ka viņai ir svinēšanas vērta dzīve, un sarīko dzimšanas dienas ballīti. Brita cenšas visus pārliecināt, ka viņai un Džoelam ir "ideāla šķiršanās".

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Semas jaunatklātā pašapziņa tiek satricināta - viņa uzzina, ka viņas jaunais priekšnieks ir pagātnes rēgs. Tikmēr Felīcija kļūdās, apsveicot savu draugu ar viņa paaugstināšanu amatā. Un Olīvija pieņem dzīvi mainošu lēmumu.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Mīmavu uzrauga stingrs probācijas virsnieks. Džordžs ņem padomu par laulībām no sava sievastēva.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Džordžs Seniors ir nobažījies, ka Mērija vēlas vēl vienu mazuli, un, viņai nezinot, veic vazektomiju. Tikmēr Šeldons pasniedz zinātnes nodarbības.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Trauslais pamiers starp vampīriem un Stetenailendas vilkačiem tiek pārbaudīts; Kolins Robinsons veido romantiskas attiecības ar jaunu kolēģi.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Vampīri dodas uz Manhetenu, lai izveidotu savienību ar vecu draugu, kurš tagad ir Manhetenas vampīru karalis.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.
