programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Semas jaunatklātā pašapziņa tiek satricināta - viņa uzzina, ka viņas jaunais priekšnieks ir pagātnes rēgs. Tikmēr Felīcija kļūdās, apsveicot savu draugu ar viņa paaugstināšanu amatā. Un Olīvija pieņem dzīvi mainošu lēmumu.

programme.title: Kentervilas spoks
programme.desc: Šajā raidījumā sekosim tehnoloģiju miljardierim, kas iegādājas māju Kentervilā, bet neapzinās, ka tās teritorijā jau gadsimtiem ilgi spokojas ļauns dzimtas spoks.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Šī kriminālseriāla darbība sākās 1970. gadu Anglijā, un tas tiek stāstīts no enigmatiska detektīva P. D. Džeimsa skatpunkta un seko Dalglīša karjerai līdz mūsdienām.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Bijušais detektīvs Karls Albergs pārceļas uz nelielu piekrastes pilsētiņu, lai rastu mierinājumu un saskaras ar virkni slepkavību. Iedzīvotāja slepkavībā Albergs aizdomās tur citu vietējo iedzīvotāju.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pie Mērdoka ierodas Terenss Meijerss. Tiek ziņots par aizdomīgu nāves gadījumu, liecinieks stāsta par dīvainām vīzijām, bet pie Džūlijas ierodas vairāki pacienti, kuri sūdzas, ka redzējuši spokus.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Krebrtijs un Efija uzzina, ka viņiem nebūs iespējas palikt medusmēnesim pasūtītajā viesnīcas istabā. Cerot pārliecināt otru viesi mainīties ar istabām, viņi to atrod mirušu gultā.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Kādas pazudušas sievietes meita nolīgst Elizu viņu atrast. Kad lietu slēdz policija, starp Elizu un Hercogu rodas jauni saspīlējumi.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: 1939. gada pavasaris: Tristans ir kvalificēts veterinārārsts, un Džeimss uzsāk jaunu dzīves posmu ar Helēnu. Tomēr tā kā karš glūn ap stūri, visiem ir jāapsver sava loma Darovbijā un ne tikai.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad laboratorijā tiek noslepkavota viņu galvenā aizdomās turamā doktore Eleina Montgomerija, Peregrīna un Džeimss ir spiesti redzēt, ka viņu slepkavas motīvi ir daudz dziļāki, nekā viņi abi bija uzdrošinājušies uzskatīt.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Nozagta vērtīga Čārlza Dārvina skice, un apdrošināšanas uzņēmums noalgo Elizu to atrast, taču drīz atklājas pavērsiens.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Sākoties izmaiņām Skeldale House, visi cenšas saprasties, kā vien var, un Helēna ir ievākusies augšstāva istabā ar Džeimsu.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Rītā pēc tam, kad Ogdena bija ieradusies vieglatlētikas pasākumā, lai paziņotu par plānu ar sieviešu komandu doties uz 1912. gada olimpiādi Stokholmā, treneris atrod vienu sportistu mirušu stadionā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Melnās rokas palīga Frenka Roda tiesas sēdes rītā Mērdoks ir pārliecināts, ka beidzot izdosies panākt notiesājošu spriedumu. Džūlija ir atvieglota, jo briesmas ģimenei vairs nedraud.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Šī kriminālseriāla darbība sākās 1970. gadu Anglijā, un tas tiek stāstīts no enigmatiska detektīva P. D. Džeimsa skatpunkta un seko Dalglīša karjerai līdz mūsdienām.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla atrod draudzenei darbu netālu esošajā Grīnšovas folijā. Kad vairāki biedri tiek atrasti miruši, aizdomās tiek turēti visi, un neviens nevar iedomāties, kādus noslēpumus atklās Džeina.

programme.title: Mēnessakmens
programme.desc: Pēc emocionālas tikšanās ar Reičelu Frenklins atgriežas Verinderhausā, bet dr. Dženings piedāvā vēlreiz izspēlēt tā vakara notikumus, kad pazuda Mēnessakmens.

programme.title: Tennis: US Open
programme.desc: Coverage of one of the worlds most famous tennis tournaments; the US Open. The biggest names in the sport come together to compete in this prestigious championship; which is the final Grand Slam tournament of the year following the Australian Open, the French Open, and Wimbledon in the UK.

programme.title: "Vuelta a España". Suza–Vuarona (206,7 km)
programme.desc: Coverage of the Tour of Spain (also known as Vuelta A España). This renowned road cycling race is part of the UCI World Tour. Follow teams of world-class cyclists as they compete in-and-around Spain.

programme.title: The Spirit of Yachting
programme.desc: An exploration of the exciting world of sailing and the most important sailing events which take place all around the world. Each episode is dedicated to a specific sailing competition, telling the stories of the passionate people who participate, including events such as The Giraglia Rolex Cup or The Rolex Sydney-Hobart Yacht Race.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League. PO 2nd leg Pafos FC - FK Crvena Zvezda
UEFA Champions League. PO 2nd leg F.C. Copenhagen - FC Basel
Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Мой любимый друг
programme.desc: История девушки Маши, жизнь которой сложилась не лучшим образом. Будучи ребенком, она попала в детский дом после смерти отца и на этом ее приключения не заканчиваются.

programme.title: Shoreditch
programme.desc: Set both on the eve of World War II in a shady Shoreditch nightclub and in present-day London. Thirtysomething Tom tries to solve a murder that was committed in the club decades before.

programme.title: Back in the Day
programme.desc: A young boxer is taken under the wing of a mob boss after his Mother dies and his Father is run out of town for being an abusive alcoholic.

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Sarah tells Paul that she wants out of their marriage; the next day she disappears. A year later and Paul along with their children return to his childhood town to start anew after the loss of his wife and their mother.

programme.title: The Defender
programme.desc: Today - the global war on terror rages on. The United States will not give an inch against terrorists, especially Mohamed Jamar, considered to be the worst of them all. Jamar has been missing for months, but his network continues its function. The President stands firm before the world, but behind the scenes his teams are working to find the final solution. Jamar represents a paradox: he can never be killed, because if found dead he would become an instant martyr. If caught he must be tried. If he is found guilty he would become a martyr and further inspiration to acts of terror. If acquitted, the policies of the entire western world would be destroyed. So he must remain invisible. Roberta Jones, the head of the National Security Agency, is working to ensure he remains invisible, forever. Under the guise of attending an Eastern European conference on Terror in Romania, she attends a secret meeting with Jamar at a secluded hotel outside Bucharest. No one knows about this meeting and her goal is to buy his invisibility. Her only companions are her security team of six headed by her personal bodyguard, Lance Rockford. They are the best of the best, former military special forces personnel capable of anything. When they arrive at the hotel for the secret meeting they are ambushed no one is supposed to know about the meeting, but someone wants it stopped. They have to fight for their lives against an unknown attacker. Lance, a man of highest integrity with an impressive record of service for his country, is forced into a situation which challenges his very beliefs...

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Music critic Bob is out of a job, addicted to Zoloft, and trying to wrangle the menagerie of animals that his wife Amy has accumulated. Will adopting a baby cure their existential angst? Or should they just rescue another duck?

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: The Lucky Dragon
programme.desc: A young, Chinese dragon punished by the gods to be a mere mortal is cast down to earth. He is forced to make his way in a strange land until the evil forces discover his true identity. Take part in a world full of imagination while following the journey of a mischievous dragon who has been transformed by magic into a little boy and exiled from his home to live among humans. When both good and evil forces learn that a dragon has arrived, they look for him as he is the only one who can find the magical sword—whose owner can rule the universe! Will he find the sword in time before it gets into the wrong hands? Will he ever become a dragon again?

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: The Fire Dragon patrol, with their ever-supportive scoutmaster, is headed to Camp Rakhouta for what should be the best week of their lives. But when the "Team Spirit Stick" of the camp goes missing, the entire tradition of the camp is threatened.

programme.title: See You in September
programme.desc: See You in September is an original romantic comedy set in current day Manhattan. The film centers around Lindsay, a beautiful woman who seemingly has it all, but is deeply afraid of commitment. When she finds out that her therapist takes a vacation for the entire month of August she feels shocked and abandoned. Instead of taking this news lying down, Lindsay enlists the help of her acerbic best friend Monica to come up with a solution. With the assistance of "Craigs List", Lindsay puts together a group therapy session for all Manhattanites who are in need of therapy, but more importantly angry at their therapists for abandoning them.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Two cop partners, who are also best friends attend a domestic disturbance, only for one to accidentaly critically wound the other. The rest of the police force are suspicious that there may have been no accident.

programme.title: Lost in Florence
programme.desc: A heartbroken American in Florence gets involved in a dangerous local sport -- and with an alluring local woman.

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Sarah tells Paul that she wants out of their marriage; the next day she disappears. A year later and Paul along with their children return to his childhood town to start anew after the loss of his wife and their mother.

programme.title: A Mothers Testimony
programme.desc: An ex-convicts mothers worst suspicions about her son are confirmed when he is implicated in a murder.

programme.title: I Love Your Work
programme.desc: Gray Evans (Ribisi) and Mia Lang (Franka Potente) are a hot young acting couple whose marriage is already heading south after just a year. They make glamorous entrances at openings, get wasted behind VIP ropes at parties where they can hang with Elvis Costello (for real) and sit around reading their fan mail, all things guaranteed to generate quick viewer sympathy and identification. But the true measure of Grays intense narcissism is his conviction that hes being celebrity stalked. Now, this could all be a fantasy, as could a film he may or may not have made on the subject. But his fixation is enormous enough that, not only does he imagine his own death, but he himself begins stalking, after a fashion, a videostore clerk (Joshua Jackson) whose wife (Marisa Coughlan) and life he sees as far happier than his own. Gray also fantasizes about a conventional life with a nice former girl friend (Ricci).

programme.title: The Groomsmen
programme.desc: A groom (Ed Burns) and his four attendants wrestle with issues related to friendship and maturity a week before the big day.

programme.title: Unknown Energies, Unidentified Emotions
programme.desc: A hybrid of animated, experimental, feature and genre film in found footage technique, with a radio phonic sound and of unexpected, almost 40-minute duration. Journalist Isidor Dukas visits the Institute for Research on Psychic Phenomena and Mental Film when a confrontation with one of the test subjects transforms a routine check into a never-ending maze. Barićs work calls into question issues surrounding artistic practices in the digital age including ideas about authenticity, simulation/replication and appropriation.

programme.title: Train Master
programme.desc: 62 year old Jeremiah Wilson is truly the Train Master of Willamette Western Railroad. He lives, breaths, and eats railroad. When Brett Banner, 32 year old heir to New York Eastern talks his dad into purchasing Willamette Western, there is immediately a clash between himself and Jeremiah. Jeremiah is fired by Brett two years from retirement and turns into a angry, depressed grandfather. When Bretts nine year old son Justin realizes Jeremiahs grandson Thomas can drive a locomotive, he kidnaps and holds Thomas favorite dinosaur ransom. Justin, Thomas and 3 other children board an old engine in for repairs and accidentally turns it into runaway engine causing a chain reaction of events.

programme.title: Answer Me
programme.desc: A drama from 2004 produced in Italy, the script of which was based on the novel by Susanna Tamaro. A couple in love gets married, but when their first-born son comes to the world, the life of a young couple turns into hell.

programme.title: True Smile
programme.desc: Sergio, a 26-year-old autistic male is blind and has never seen a smile. He does, however, give everybody a sincere smile every day. A documentary based on the amazing story encapsulated by Sergio Aznarez Rosados life.

programme.title: Zen Noir
programme.desc: A nameless "noir" detective, still mourning the loss of his wife, investigates a mysterious death in a Buddhist temple, but his logical, left-brained crime-solving skills are useless in the intuitive, non-linear world of Zen.

programme.title: Irish Jam
programme.desc: Upon discovering that their town is up for sale, crafty Irish villagers scheme to raise the money to prevent the buy-out...

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Sarah tells Paul that she wants out of their marriage; the next day she disappears. A year later and Paul along with their children return to his childhood town to start anew after the loss of his wife and their mother.

programme.title: Max Cloud
programme.desc: A space cruiser crash lands on the purple planet of Heinous, an intergalactic prison that is home to the most vile and dangerous villains in the galaxy. All of the crew have perished except for its pilot; intergalactic space hero Max Cloud, the ships hapless chef Jake, and its reluctant Commander, Rexy. Their mission is simple, wait inside their vessel until help arrives and try their best to keep the prisoners outside from getting in, however this is Max Cloud and he doesnt do simple. ...But this is not real life. This is a video-game, and at the helm of the adventure is Sarah, a teenage video game fanatic who immerses herself in fantasy to avoid dealing with her less than packed social life and a strained relationship with her dad, straight laced single parent Tony. After a fallout, Tony bans Sarah from playing games and in a frenzy of teenage emotion Sarah makes a wish, that in the blink of an eye becomes a reality... With a flash of pixelated light Sarah is transported into the video game by the mysterious Space Witch, who exists in an etherial void, behind a secret door, that never appears in the same place twice! So Sarah finds herself trapped inside the game and the only person who can help her is her equally socially defunct but incredibly charming friend, Cowboy, who must control Sarah from her bedroom in Brooklyn and keep her from losing her one life, in a game that cant be paused, that they have never finished before! To make matters worse Sarah has not found herself inside the body of the wonderful Max Cloud, but Jake, thats right... the hapless chef. We follow Sarah as she negotiates the terrifying and dangerous planet of Heinous alongside the ever confident Max and fed up Rexy, jumping back and forth with the real world as the pressure mounts on Cowboy and the real stakes start to rise. They soon encounter stranded Bounty Hunter, Brock Donnelly, and realise they must get off the planet before help arrives as the planets surface burns so hot every day that anything not underground is space liquid! AND to add to the stakes Cowboy must keep his best friend away from the evil clutches of the games villain Revengor, a part man, part machine, lunatic who is hell bent on taking Max Clouds ship and with an army of prisoners and an evil sorcersss called SHEE, his chances look pretty damn good. The action bounces between the video game and the real world as Cowboy and Sarah must come together to get her home, all leading to the ultimate showdown in Revengors lair, where back in Brooklyn, video game expertise arrives in the form of a very unlikely hero. Sit down. Plug in. Its time to play THE INTERGALACTIC ADVENTURES OF MAX CLOUD.

programme.title: Talea
programme.desc: Summertime. Everybody is excited to go on vacation to Italy. Everybody but Jasmin. Jasmin is yearning something. She wants to be with Eva, her mother, from whom she had to live seperately for a long time. For weeks, Jasmin is trying to get close to Eva. She does not give up, even if shes rejected. After an argument, Jasmin runs away from her fosterhome and convinces Eva to leave the city together and go on a trip. The two get closer -- sometimes as friends, sometimes as mother and daughter. A first joint cigarette, a dance in the village disco, wanderings through the woods. But expectations and needs of the girl and her mother are diverging repeatedly, especially when a man attracts Evas attention and disturbs the growing closeness between mother and daughter.

programme.title: Fatal Sin
programme.desc: A boy and a girl fall in love. But on the night they met, she was drunk and stoned and he toke advantage of her. Although she does not remember almost anything from that night, she remembers something that may compromise their relationship.

programme.title: Spooner
programme.desc: Facing eviction from his parents home on his 30th birthday, a socially awkward guy meets the girl of his dreams and creates his own rules for growing up.

programme.title: Hidden Agenda
programme.desc: Jason Price specializes in running people underground with new identities. He is fighting to uncover the true identity of a killer - is it his best friend, fbi agent Sonny, who is supposed to be dead, or his new love, the enigmatic and sexy Renee..?

programme.title: The Flock
programme.desc: This film is about a hyper-vigilant employee of the department of public safety who, while training his young female replacement, has to track down a missing girl who he is convinced is connected to a paroled sex offender he is investigating.

programme.title: Karstā čiksa
programme.desc: Džesika Spensere ir populāra un skaista meitene, kura ir nekrietna pret citiem cilvēkiem. Kādu dienu Džesika pamostas un saprot, ka viņa ir apmainījusies ķermeņiem ar kādu pieaugušu vīrieti.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Ziemeļu meža ceļš.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Telefona būda
programme.desc: Ko tu dari, kad izdzirdi telefona zvanu, ejot garām telefona būdai? Tu zini, ka zvanītājs ir kļūdījies, bet tomēr instinkts tev liek pacelt klausuli. Zvanošs telefons pieprasa, lai klausule tiktu pacelta, bet kad Stjū atbild uz šādu zvanu, viņš tiek ierauts bīstamā spēlē. Jo zvanītājs apgalvo – ja Stjū noliks klausuli, viņš... mirs.

programme.title: Nogalināt Bilu
programme.desc: Pēc pamošanās no četrus gadus ilgušas komas, bijusī slepkava meklē iespēju atriebt ļaundariem, kas viņu nodeva.

programme.title: Karstā čiksa

programme.title: Sairuss
programme.desc: Džons ir šķīries pusmūža vīrietis, kas samierinājies ar domu par dzīvi vientulībā. Bijusī sievas, kas joprojām ir viņa labākā draudzene, gandrīz ar varu aizved Džonu uz viesībām, kur viņš iepazīstas ar savu sapņu sievieti - Molliju. Abi sāk tikties un drīz vien iemīlas, taču Mollijas greizsirdīgais dēls Sairuss, kuram ar māti ir īpaši ciešas attiecības, sāk traucēt abu laimei.

programme.title: Nogalināt Bilu
programme.desc: Līgava turpina savu atriebes kāres ceļojumu pret savu bijušo priekšnieku un mīlnieku Bilu, izsitēju Badu un vienacaino Ellu.

programme.title: Hanna
programme.desc: Hannai ir tikai 16 gadu, bet spēkos, izturībā un attapībā viņa var mēroties ar specvienības kareivi. Hanna dziļos Somijas mežos uzaugusi kopā ar tēvu, ar nemitīgiem treniņiem un izturības pārbaudēm viņš tīņu meiteni ir izaudzinājis par perfektu slepkavu.

programme.title: Bandīts

programme.title: Atkal tu

programme.title: Viesnīca "Diženā Budapešta"
programme.desc: Viesnīca "Diženā Budapešta" stāsta par Eiropā slavenās viesnīcas leģendārā viesmīļa Gustava H un portjē Zero Mustafa piedzīvojumiem. Viesnīcas darbinieki kļūst par lieciniekiem nenovērtējamas renesanses gleznas zādzībai, kādas bagātas ģimenes cīņai par milzīgu mantojumu un dramatiskām izmaiņām, kuras notiek Eiropā periodā starp diviem pasaules kariem.

programme.title: Lakricas pica
programme.desc: Stāsts par Alanu Keinu un Geriju Valentīnu - viņu pieaugšanu un iziešanu cauri pirmās mīlestības nodevībai Sanfernando ielejā, 1973. gadā.

programme.title: Šedevrs
programme.desc: Arturo ir negodīgs mākslas darbu tirgotājs, bet Renco - viņa savdabīgais gleznotājs un ilggadējais draugs. Esot gatavi riskēt ar visu, viņi rada ekstrēmu un muļķīgu plānu sevis glābšanai.

programme.title: Chef Grudge Match
programme.desc: Gabe Bertaccini settles a 15-year grudge against Tyler Romine, and rival caterers Taylor Frankel and Maria Busato go head-to-head.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: Seventh-Inning Stress. Its Healthcare Worker Appreciation Night in Albuquerque, New Mexico, and Robert Irvine is tasked with serving an elevated dinner to 250 deserving guests.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Best Baker in America
programme.desc: Cooking competition show in which professional and home bakers compete in a baking tournament. programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: BBQ Brawl: Flay V. Anderson V. Voltaggio
programme.desc: Bobby Flay, Sunny Anderson and Michael Voltaggio dig into all-American BBQ with an advantage challenge featuring sports fan favourites.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: In the final shift, the five remaining chefs take on a familiar challenge before creating an elevated breakfast, lunch and dinner for the judges.

programme.desc: Celebrity pastry chef Duff Goldman and his team of decorators and designers create unique and spectacular cakes for special occasions, such as birthdays or weddings. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: BBQ Brawl: Flay V. Anderson V. Voltaggio
programme.desc: Bobby Flay, Sunny Anderson and Michael Voltaggio dig into all-American BBQ with an advantage challenge featuring sports fan favourites.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: In the final shift, the five remaining chefs take on a familiar challenge before creating an elevated breakfast, lunch and dinner for the judges.

programme.title: Best Baker in America
programme.desc: Cooking competition show in which professional and home bakers compete in a baking tournament. For six weeks, eight skilled bakers are challenged to use their style and technical abilities to make stunning, tasty treats and impress the judges - from macarons, fruit tarts, creme brulee to spectacular and elaborately-decorated cakes. One person gets eliminated every week by the panel of judges, until the final where the best three bakers compete for the grand prize of $25,000 and the title of Best Baker in America.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: The Last Day of the Dictator
The Last Day of the Dictator
Labs cilvēks
programme.desc: Elisones dzīve apgriežas kājām gaisā, pēc tam kad viņa iekļūst nāvējošā negadījumā.

programme.title: Sliktie puiši uz mūžu
programme.desc: Sliktie puiši ir atpakaļ! Tiesa gan, viņi dzīvo katrs savu dzīvi. Maikam ir pusmūža krīze, viņš braukā ar sporta automobiļiem un regulāri iekuļas nepatikšanās. Markuss ir nodibinājis ģimeni, kļuvis par policijas inspektoru un arvien biežāk domā par pensionēšanos. Taču, kad pēc Maika dzīvības sāk tīkot noslēpumaini noziedznieki, leģendārais duets atkal apvienojas, lai paveiktu vēl vienu bīstamu misiju.

programme.title: Mirušie nesāpina
programme.desc: Divi pionieri Amerikas pilsoņu kara laikā frontē cīnās par savu dzīvību un mīlestību.

programme.title: Kapteinis Zobenzobs un burvju briljants
programme.desc: Ļaunais princis Megans Hans no džungļiem un Karību jūras pirāts kapteinis Zobenzobs jau sen dzen maģiskā briljanta pēdas. Tas nav parasts dārgakmens. Pusnaktī tas spēj piepildīt viskvēlāko vēlēšanos, lai kāda tā būtu. Visi meklējumi "kaķim zem astes", taču tad, klejodams pa džungļiem, burvju dārgakmeni nejauši ierauga mazais Marks.

programme.title: Alita: Kaujas eņģelis
programme.desc: Pasauli iznīcinājis Lielais karš, sagraujot ikvienu pilsētu savā ceļā, izņemot to, zem kuras trīssimt gadu laikā ir izaugusi vēl viena, kur iedzīvotāji cīnās par labklājības druskām no virszemes. Apakšējās pilsētas izgāztuvē tādējādi nonāk arī kādas kiborgmeitenes atliekas, un doktoram Ido šķiet, ka viņa ir pārsteidzoši līdzīga briesmīgajiem kaujas eņģeļiem, kas reiz piedalījās Lielajā karā.

programme.title: Grāmatu zagle
programme.desc: Filma "Grāmatu zagle", kuras pamatā ir pasaulē populārs romāns, ir stāsts par neparastu, enerģisku meiteni, kuru Otrā pasaules kara laikā Vācijā nosūta dzīvot audžuģimenē. Meiteni ieintriģē vienīgā grāmata, ko viņa paņēmusi līdzi, tāpēc viņa sāk kolekcionēt grāmatas. Ar savu jauno vecāku un zem kāpnēm mītošā slepenā viesa palīdzību meitene iemācās lasīt un izveido brīnumainu pasauli, kas iedvesmo viņus visus.

programme.title: Maskētie spiegi
programme.desc: Superspiegs Lenss Sterlings ir labākais savā profesijā un, būdams dzīvesprieka pilns, viņš ar lielāko prieku katru dienu glābj pilsētas un valstis. Jaunais zinātnieks Volters, kurš apgādā Lensu ar modernām ierīcēm, ir pilnīgs pretstats – būdams vienmēr drūms, viņš cenšas būt nošķirts no visas pasaules un palikt vienatnē ar saviem izgudrojumiem. Taču pienāk brīdis, kad neparastajam pārītim būs jāatrod kopīga valoda, lai ar neticamu brīnumu palīdzību izglābtu pasauli.

programme.title: Mošķu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Kas jauns mošķu pasaulē? Kāzas! Ragana un viņas iemīļotais Renfīlds, grāfa Drakulas sulainis, nolēmuši neslēpt savas jūtas un... salaulāties! Taču nupat sākusies laulību ceremonija tūdaļ pārtrūkst. Viesu acu priekšā mīlētājus nolaupa ar pārcilvēciskām spējām apveltītā mošķu medniece Mila. Šai mazulītei labāk netuvoties. Viņa ir ātrāka par vēju un apgādāta ar vismodernākajām tehnoloģijām – tās ieraugot, pat Džeimss Bonds viņu apskaustu.

programme.title: Kentervilas spoks
programme.desc: Sera Saimona de Kentervila rēgs jau 300 gadus klīst pa savrupmāju, meklēdams drosmīgu pēcnācēju, kurš viņu varētu atbrīvot no Kentervila lāsta. Kad šajā savrupmājā ievācas kāda amerikāņu ģimene, spokam parādās cerību stariņš beidzot tapt atbrīvotam.

programme.title: Vilks un Lauva
programme.desc: Pēc vectēva nāves 20 gadus vecā pianiste Alma atgriežas bērnības mājās. Drīz viņas dzīvē notiek negaidīts pavērsiens. Nez no kurienes uzradusies vectēva draudzene baltā vilcene atved savu mazuli un pati nozūd. Tad netālu avarē lidmašīna, un meitene tās atlūzās atrod brīnumainā kārtā izdzīvojušu lauvēnu. Alma nolemj abus paturēt, un notiek neticamais – mazuļi kopā aug un iemīl viens otru kā brāļus. Bet idilliskā pasaule sabrūk, kad viņu noslēpums nāk gaismā.

programme.title: Karalis Artūrs
programme.desc: Artūrs nevēlas kļūt par vadoni. Viņa vienīgā vēlme ir atstāt Lielbritāniju un atgriezties Romas mierīgajā un līdzsvarotajā dzīvē. Taču pirms tam viņam kopā ar Apaļā galda bruņiniekiem jādodas pēdējā uzdevumā. Top skaidrs, ka pēc Romas sairšanas Lielbritānijai vajadzēs karali, kas ne tikai aizsargās valsti pret nemitīgajiem sakšu iebrukumiem, bet arī iedibinās uz salas jaunu kārtību. Ar Merlina un daiļās, drosmīgās Ginevras atbalstu Artūram būs sevī jārod spēks, lai mainītu vēstures gaitu.

programme.title: Asiņu grāmatas
programme.desc: Uz Klaivas Bārkeres šausmu romāniem balstīta filma, kurā trīs stāsti saplūst vienā laikā un telpā, liekot skatītāju elpai aizrauties un sirdij pukstēt neveselīgi ātri.

programme.title: Uz visu banku
programme.desc: Prinstonas absolvents Ričijs uzskata, ka ir piekrāpts, tāpēc dodas uz Kostariku, lai izteiktu savas pretenzijas interneta azartspēļu magnātu Aivenu Bloku. Ričiju iekārdina Bloka solītā pasakainā bagātība, taču drīz vien viņš uzzina biedējošu patiesību par savu labdari. Kad FIB cenšas piespiest Ričiju palīdzēt tikt galā ar Bloku, puisi gaida mūža lielākais risks: viņam jāmēģina pārspēt abi draudīgie spēki.

programme.title: Stabilizators
programme.desc: Izbijušais kareivis Roberts Makols ir nešaubīgs apspiesto un pakļauto aizstāvis. Kad pasūtījuma slepkavas nogalina viņa bijušo priekšnieci, Stabilizators ķeras pie lietas, lai atriebtu viņas nāvi. Viņam būs jāizrēķinās ar četriem ļoti pieredzējušiem slepkavām, kas ir tikpat labi apmācīti kā viņš. Par laimi, Roberts nekad neko neatstāj pamestu pusratā.

programme.title: Ādas kopšana
programme.desc: Slavenās Houpas Goldmanas kosmētikas bizness piedzīvo sabotāžu, kad pāri ielai veikalu atvēr sāncensis Endžels Vergara. Drauga Džordana iedrošināta un atbalstīta, Houpa cer atklāt to, kurš cenšas sadragāt viņas reputāciju.

programme.title: Dīvainie
programme.desc: Valdot pilnīgam alkohola un narkotiku aizliegumam, atlikusī iespēja izpriecāties ir viena vienīga diena gadā.

programme.title: Neparastā maģija
programme.desc: Stāsts par divām, blakus esošām, bet pilnībā nošķirtām karaļvalstīm – Feju karaļvalsti un Tumšo mežu. Neprātīga pasaka, kurā satiekas raiba kompānija: rūķi, elfi, fejas un velnēni. Viņus visus sagaida raibi piedzīvojumi, pārpratumi un jautrība! Šo trako stāstu izstāstīt palīdzēs vairāku desmitgažu populārākā mūzika.

programme.title: Kovboji un citplanētieši
programme.desc: Grāvējfilmu režisors Džons Favro, aktieri Daniels Kreigs un Harisons Fords kopā ar producentiem Stīvenu Spīlbergu, Braianu Greizeru un Ronu Hovardu piedāvā asa sižeta piedzīvojumu filmu, kurā Mežonīgie rietumi sastapsies ar vēl nepieredzētu pretspēku. Un tas nebūs no šīs pasaules. 1873. gads, Arizona. Svešinieks, kurš neatceras, kas ar viņu noticis pagātnē, ierodas kādā pilsētiņā. Viņam ap roku ir noslēpumaina aproce – tā ir vienīgā norāde uz viņa neparasto pagātni. Viņš atklāj, ka šejienieši nav no viesmīlīgākajiem ļautiņiem, un katru viņu soli nosaka pulkvedis Dolarhaids un viņa cietā dūre. Ikviens šajā pilsētiņā dzīvo bailēs.

programme.title: Transformeri: Nezvēru laikmets
programme.desc: Spraigi piedzīvojumi un elpu aizraujošs specefektu vēriens ir aizrāvis "Transformers" filmu fanus visā pasaulē jau kopš pirmās filmas iznākšanas uz kinoekrāniem! Jaunākā filma "Transformeri: Nezvēru laikmets" aizvedīs skatītājus aizraujošā kino piedzīvojumā apkārt pasaulei 90. gados un iepazīstinās ar pilnīgi jauniem transformeriem – The Maximals. Cīņa starp Autobotiem un Maldikoniem norisināsies jaunā līmenī!

programme.title: Kā Grinčs nozaga Ziemassvētkus
programme.desc: Vūvila ir maza, brīnumaina pilsētiņa, kas atrodas sniegpārsliņā. Visiem Vūvivas iedzīvotājiem ļoti patīk Ziemassvētki. Taču pilsētiņas tuvumā mīt Grinčs — ļoti nejauks radījums, kuram riebjas gan Ziemassvētki, gan arī vūvilieši, jo tie savulaik viņu izstūmuši no sava vidus. Redzot, kā viņi priecājas un gaida svētkus, Grinčs nolemj nozagt visas Ziemassvētku dāvanas. Bet varbūt kādai mazai meitenītei izdosies sadraudzēties ar Grinču un likt viņam mainīt savus plānus?

programme.title: Dziedi!
programme.desc: Kad viņa teātrim draud slēgšana, uzņēmējdarbībā pieredzējušais koala Basters Mūns (Metjū Makonahijs) sarīko dziesmu konkursu. Daudziem vietējiem zvēriem tas rada iespēju izpausties. Cūka Rosita (Rīza Viterspūna) ir māte un mājsaimniece, kura atteicās no pusaudža sapņa kļūt par dziedātāju. Pusaudze dzeloņcūka Eša (Skārleta Johansone) ir pancīga roķere alternatīvās mūzikas grupā. Gorillu Džoniju (Tārons Edžertons) viņa tēvs (Pīters Serafinovičs) grib pārliecināt pievērsties savam banku aplaupītāja arodam. Ikkatrs no šiem radījumiem vēlas piepildīt savu sapni un dziedāt no visas sirds!

programme.title: Arī divi ir ģimene
programme.desc: Semjuels ir tipisks vecpuiša tips – viņš dzīvo šai dienai un par nākotni īpaši nedomā. Kādu dienu viņu pārsteidz Kristīne, sieviete, ar kuru Semjuelam bijis viens nakts sakars, ar zīdaini uz rokām. Paziņojusi, ka tā ir Semjuela meita Glorija, Kristīne dodas prom. Semjuelam nav nekādas intereses audzināt bērnu, tas nekādi nesader ar viņa dzīves veidu. Tomēr izskatās, ka izvēles nav, un pamazām viņš meiteni iemīļo. Viss ir jauki līdz dienai, kad pie durvīm atkal klauvē Glorijas mamma Kristīne.

programme.title: Džūdija
programme.desc: Leģendārā Džūdija Gārlenda 1968. gada ziemā ierodas Londonā, lai uzstātos izpārdotu koncertu sērijā.

programme.title: Putncilvēks
programme.desc: Strauji novecojis, slavas norietā esošs aktieris, kurš reiz atveidoja pasaulē slavenu supervaroni, cīnās ar ģimenes likstām, paša egoismu un citiem šķēršļiem, cenšoties izveidot Brodvejas izrādi, no kuras atkarīga viņa turpmākā karjera un, iespējams, arī dzīve. Mākslas filma ieguva septiņas "Zelta globusa" nominācijas, no kurām saņēma divas – kategorijās "Labākais aktieris mūziklā vai komēdijā" un "Labākais scenārijs", tāpat filma saņēma arī deviņas "Oskara" nominācijas, no kurām balvu saņēma četrās kategorijās. Rigana lomas atveidotājs Maikls Kītons vienu no slavenākajām lomām atveidoja asa sižeta piedzīvojumu filmā "Betmens" (1989). Filmas režisors ir Meksikā dzimušais Alehandro Gonzalezs Injaritu, kurš pazīstams ar filmām "Mīla kuce" (2000), "21 grams" (2003), "Bābele" (2006) un "Biutiful" (2010). Injaritu filmas ir mākslinieciski augstvērtīgi un sarežģīti "juveliera darbi"; sadarbību ar režisoru slavējuši vairāki augstas raudzes Holivudas aktieri, tostarp Šons Pens, Naomi Votsa, Benisio del Toro, Breds Pits, Keita Blanšeta, Havjers Bardems.

programme.title: Lidojuma plāns
programme.desc: Atrodoties 12 kilometru augstumā starp Berlīni un Ņujorku, Kaila piedzīvo savas dzīves ļaunāko murgu – lidmašīnā mīklaini pazūd viņas mazā meita Džūlija. Būdama emocionāli un psihiski nestabila pēc vīra pēkšņās nāves, Kaila visiem spēkiem cenšas pierādīt, ka, neskatoties uz lidmašīnas apkalpes un pasažieru domām, viņa tomēr nav zaudējusi prātu. Lai arī Kailu mēģina pārliecināt, ka lidmašīnā viņa iekāpusi viena un neesot nekādu datu, ka Džūlija vispār esot atradusies lidmašīnā, izmisušajai mātei atliek paļauties vienīgi uz saviem spēkiem, lai rastu risinājumu neprātīgajai situācijai un glābtu savu meitu.

programme.title: Kingsman: Slepenais dienests
programme.desc: Režisora Metjū Vona filma "Kingsman: Slepenais dienests", kuras pamatā ir godalgots komikss, vēsta par īpaši slepenu spiegu organizāciju, kas rekrutē savā nežēlīgas konkurences apmācību programmā neprasmīgu, taču daudzsološu ielaspuiku, jo pasauli apdraud jucis tehnoloģiju ģēnijs.

programme.title: Dzeguze
programme.desc: Septiņpadsmitgadniece Grēthena spiesta pārcelties kopā ar ģimeni uz vietu, kur nekas nav tā, kā izskatās.

programme.title: UFC. Johnny Walker-Zhang Mingyang
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Levante - Barcelona
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Futbols: Bundesliga. Gladbach - HSV
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

DFB Pokal. Wehen Wiesbaden - FC Bayern Munchen
Futbols: DFB Kauss. Eintracht Braunschweig - Stuttgart
Home Town
programme.desc: In this home improvement show, watch Ben and Erin Napier renovate old dulling houses in Mississippi, USA to dream homes. The pair are hoping to share their love of the small, historic homes of the town, and also transfer the enthusiasm of renovating a place to other home buyers. But can issues arise with the home replenishments. Since all the houses are extremely old, Ben and Erin do face problems ensuring the house dont get damaged when they work on them, and also that they can keep up with their original up to scratch plans. All the meanwhile they both ensure the homes are renovated at a low budgeted rate. Are they able to create beautiful homes for the people of Mississippi without damaging the infrastructure of the house too much? This fun-loving reality series has been running since 2016.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Castle Impossible
programme.desc: Daphne and Ian aim to transform a 300-year-old outbuilding into a luxury home. Plus, the kitchen refurb may be doomed before it even begins.

programme.title: Rico To the Rescue
programme.desc: Rico and his team step in to help a couple with a dream home renovation that continues to be stalled by their current contractors lack of focus.

programme.title: Rico To the Rescue
programme.desc: Rico and his team help a family with a plan to put a modern twist on their dated home. Theres a lot of work to do after two separate contractors fail to deliver.

programme.title: Christina on the Coast
programme.desc: Christina on the Coast is an American home renovation TV series featuring Christina Anstead, an American real estate investor and TV personality. The series premiere focuses on Anstead renovating her new home following her divorce with Tarek El Moussa, with whom they hosted Flip or Flop show. The remaining seven episodes presents her fixing up other peoples homes in Southern California. She puts a greater emphasis on design, which is her favorite part of the house-flipping process and she is happy to be able to create a space people have dreamed of.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: The Hotel
programme.desc: With construction finished, Jo and her team attempt to style the entire hotel. But an unexpected elevator issue threatens to delay their progress.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: The Hotel
programme.desc: Before opening to the public, Chip, Jo, and Ben walk through the newly refurbished Hotel 1928 and reveal how they pulled off their biggest project to date.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Battle on the Mountain
programme.desc: The competition heats up as the teams take on the living rooms. Teams rely on creative instincts as theyre challenged to fit antiques into their designs.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Vintage Flip
programme.desc: Jessie and Tina Rodriguez take their passion for vintage homes to the next level. They find and buy historic homes to restore and sell at a profit.

programme.title: Vintage Flip
programme.desc: Jessie and Tina Rodriguez take their passion for vintage homes to the next level. They find and buy historic homes to restore and sell at a profit.

programme.title: Flipping 101 with Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Getting into property flipping can be daunting for first-timers, which is why Tarek El Moussa is on hand to share invaluable advice that will put them on course for handsome profits. With years in the industry, Tarek has seen and done it all. Now he wants to draw on some of his own experiences to ensure novice flippers dont make costly mistakes. Aided by Tareks knowledge and a few of his clients, surely nothing can go wrong? Reality series.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Unspouse My House
programme.desc: Forgetting your ex isnt so easy when your whole house reminds you of them. Everywhere you turn, theres that horrible wall paper they insisted on getting, pictures of your holidays together, they even painted your front door their favourite colour. Thats where designer Orlando Soria comes in. Orlando considers himself somewhat a break-up expert, and hes determined to give these newly single clients houses the new lease of life that they so desperately need, allowing them to move on from their ex.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Origins
programme.desc: Based solely on Charles Darwins Theory of Evolution, the rapid development of modern humans seems impossible without a "missing link." Could this link involve extraterrestrial intervention?

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are at the end of their road trip in Winston-Salem. They aim to strike deals with experts, visit antique tractors, try weapons at the range, and meet a NASCAR legend before heading home.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Shipping Wars
programme.desc: Groups of independent shippers compete with each other in this American reality series, as they bid for the right to haul unconventional items that many conventional carriers deem unfeasible to transport. The crews must first win the right to ship the items by bidding on uShip, an online auction house that is one of the largest of its kind in the world. Once they have won the contract, they prepare the items for shipping, which is often easier said than done. The crews performances are scrutinised throughout, and their operational abilities are pushed to their limits as they transport both bizarre and tricky shipments across the country.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Shipping Wars

The crews must first win the right to ship the items by bidding on uShip, an online auction house that is one of the largest of its kind in the world. Once they have won the contract, they prepare the items for shipping, which is often easier said than done. The crews performances are scrutinised throughout, and their operational abilities are pushed to their limits as they transport both bizarre and tricky shipments across the country.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are ready to wrangle some wild deals in the Lone Star State. Along the way, the guys test-drive a 1968 Buick Riviera, become riveted by a blacksmiths anvil collection, and meet up with NFL legend, Emmitt Smith.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did a loyal viewer capture an image of an alien probe? What is the identity of a creature spotted on camera? Did the legendary Men in Black call a man and threaten him? Tony Harris and his team of experts dive into these claims to find the truth.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The UnXplained: Mysteries of the Universe
programme.desc: The blue marble we call Earth remains in large part a mystery to the 8 billion people who live on it. How did Earth come to exist, and what are the secrets of its survival? How long will humans be able to call it "home"?

programme.title: Shipping Wars

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are hoping to strike it rich in the Mill City, Minneapolis, Minnesota. While there, the guys have a brush with a happy little Bob Ross painting, tackle a jersey signed by the Minnesota Vikings Purple People Eaters.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Origins
programme.desc: Based solely on Charles Darwins Theory of Evolution, the rapid development of modern humans seems impossible without a "missing link." Could this link involve extraterrestrial intervention?

programme.title: Sitting Bull
programme.desc: Sitting Bull and Crazy Horse face George Armstrong Custer and the Seventh Cavalry in the most famous battle of the American West at Little Bighorn. When their legendary triumph over the US Army fails to end the war--they must continue the fight.
