After discovering his grave marked with the words "Unknown Negro," local journalist Marresa Burke is determined to find his family. Teaming up the DNA Doe Project, they take a sample from his exhumed body before following a trail of clues across the country.

programme.title: India from Above
programme.desc: Fly over the worlds largest religious gathering, dive into the festival of colors, explore traditional techniques of building wooden ships, run one of the worlds highest ultra-marathons, experience the worlds biggest election and discover the training of the Border Security Forces Camel Contingent in an episode where the ancient and modern coexist. This is India From Above.

programme.title: India from Above
programme.desc: A journey through Indias fascinating natural wonders: the land of 40-million-year-old monsoons that nourish man and nature; the Thar desert, where women officers brave extreme weather to guard the nation; a floating civilization on a lake; the marble rocks of Bhedaghat; a crater lake; the white desert-supplier of the countrys salt; and a migration saved by a village. Experience India From Above.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: On 4 November 2010, just after take-off from Singapore Changi Airport, Qantas Flight 32 suffered engine failure that severely compromised the aircraft. The crew spent two tense hours in the air before navigating a successful emergency landing, saving everyone onboard. In this episode, Captain Richard de Crespigny shares his account of heroically handling what could have been certain disaster.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: On August 12, 1985, Japan Airlines 123 was scheduled to carry 524 passengers from Tokyo to Osaka. But just 12 minutes into the flight, the Boeing 747 suffered a fatal decompression that ripped off most of the tail. With a total loss of hydraulics, the crew was unable to control the aircraft. Using flight simulators, seasoned pilots attempt to avoid the crash that killed 520 people.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: On July 19, 1989, United Airlines Flight 232 departed from Denver to Chicago when the DC-10 aircraft suffered a catastrophic failure. The crew onboard faced the impossible task of landing with a total loss of control. 112 passengers perished in the horrific crash and 184 people survived. Survivors, give a first-hand account of what could have been their final moments.

programme.title: Colossal Machines
programme.desc: Historically, mining has been a very dangerous and labor-intensive process. Now, with the evolution of engineering, colossal machines have made the unthinkable possible. Engineering experts share the development and functions of gearless mill drives, giant metal shredders, and explosive-clearing vehicles.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: A container ship strikes the Francis Scott Key Bridge, causing it to collapse and paralyze the Port of Baltimore. Other fails include a roof collapse at a Dutch soccer stadium, a crane fire 45 floors over Manhattan, two Scottish towers that fail to fall in a controlled demolition, and a sewer pressure test in China that sends a "poonami" into the sky. Its enough to turn one to drink … at the Crooked House, Englands wonkiest pub.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: In Turkey, buildings claiming to be earthquake-proof end up falling down. Two gantry cranes bump into each other on a harbor in Taiwan; and a battery factory blows up in South Korea, resulting in a bad day at the office. Knob and tube wiring might be obsolete, but the Sydney Opera House is going strong, despite its many initial design flaws. The city of Dresden wishes they could reverse engineer the collapse of the Carola Bridge.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Inside Incredible Machines
programme.desc: For forty years, Nimitz class aircraft carriers have delivered US military might wherever it is needed, anywhere on the globe. But now, this legendary design is being phased out and new carriers are planned. But until theyre ready, the giant Nimitz ships have to be kept at the forefront of military technology. In this episode, engineer and host Chad Zdenek spends a week on board the USS Carl Vinson to work with the highly trained specialist engineers, mechanics and sailors who keep this incredible floating city in perfect working order during a critical mission in the Pacific - training twenty F18 pilots who have never taken off from an Aircraft Carrier before. This gives Chad the chance to discover the five engineering innovations at the heart of Americas most incredible Aircraft Carrier.

programme.title: Worlds Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: Reality series in which professional rigger, adventure junkie and science geek Sean Riley participates in various tough fixes- repairs and renovations done on equipment that is very large or dangerous. He will work with other specialized engineers and experts in order to tackle some uniquely difficult jobs such as a pressure dome replacement for an Air Seychelles Boeing 767-300ER, fixing of a cruise ships power generator in Grand Bahama Island, replacing a bridge in Utah, replacement of a nuclear turbine in Susquehanna Steam Electric Station, and many other grand and tough jobs.

programme.title: Worlds Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: Reality series in which professional rigger, adventure junkie and science geek Sean Riley participates in various tough fixes- repairs and renovations done on equipment that is very large or dangerous. He will work with other specialized engineers and experts in order to tackle some uniquely difficult jobs such as a pressure dome replacement for an Air Seychelles Boeing 767-300ER, fixing of a cruise ships power generator in Grand Bahama Island, replacing a bridge in Utah, replacement of a nuclear turbine in Susquehanna Steam Electric Station, and many other grand and tough jobs.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Maritime archaeologists and historians go in search of the crucial component in the Atlantic Slave Trade: the slave ship. An armoured, floating fortress operating for over four centuries, capturing and transporting over 12 million Africans, who were sold and forced to work in brutal conditions in the New World. By draining we reveal the cruel technology on-board, gain an insight into the horrific conditions and ID a wreck in Alabama that could be the last ever slave ship to bring Africans to American soil.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: CBP officers at PortMiami find nine kilograms of cocaine worth $460,000 magnetically attached to a ship, before unboxing a load of styrofoam found to conceal 215 kilograms of cocaine worth $11 million. In El Paso, HSI agents pursue an SUV loaded with eight kilograms of cocaine in the hopes of busting a cartel handoff. At JFK, officers screen flights for individuals attempting to bring luxury goods into the US without paying import duty taxes.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler

Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: Trafficked with Mariana van Zeller
programme.desc: Mariana investigates the global phenomenon of armored car heists, responsible for some of the most brazen and dangerous robberies in the world. In Los Angeles and in Johannesburg, shell meet crews, learn how they plan their attacks, and go behind the scenes to understand the ever-expanding arms race between these criminals and the private security companies trying to stop them.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: On 4 November 2010, just after take-off from Singapore Changi Airport, Qantas Flight 32 suffered engine failure that severely compromised the aircraft. The crew spent two tense hours in the air before navigating a successful emergency landing, saving everyone onboard. In this episode, Captain Richard de Crespigny shares his account of heroically handling what could have been certain disaster.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Flying just a few hundred feet above the desert, six single-engine WW2 fighter planes get into position for the highlight event of the Reno Air Races. And with 30,000 spectators watching from below, they fly an eight-mile oval at close to 450 miles per hour. Competing in a highly-modified P-51 Mustang called The Galloping Ghost, local legend Jimmy Leeward is determined to set a new speed record. But half-way through the race, his plane suddenly pitches up, spirals out of control, and crashes onto the tarmac in front of the stands. Its one of the worst air race crashes of all time, and investigators call on the pilots close friend to help them piece together what went wrong.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: En route to the Dominican Republic with more than 87,000 pounds of denim, Fine Air Cargo Flight 101 takes off from Miami. But just moments later, the plane crashes to the ground, careens across a freeway, and plows into a building. Hundreds of bystanders witness the carnage, and though investigators are determined to figure out what happened, it will take an anonymous tip to break the case wide open.

programme.title: Mysterious Islands
programme.desc: Enormous ancient terraces made of volcanic rocks in West Java, Indonesia, have origins shrouded in mystery. Hundreds of human skeletal remains unearthed on the island of St. Helena reveal a dark and sorrowful past. In the Persian gulf, a blood-red beach on Hormuz Island ignites wild speculation. Mysterious penguin remains are discovered in a place beyond the reach of these short-legged creatures.

programme.title: Mysterious Islands
programme.desc: Findings include a small volcanic island off coast of Edinburgh with a dark past; elaborate ancient Egyptian style burials on Sudans Sai Island. A bronze device recovered from a long, lost shipwreck is actually an ancient analog computer. Scientists investigating the sudden disappearance of sharks around Californian islands reveal the interesting connection between orcas and great white sharks.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler

programme.title: Trafficked with Mariana van Zeller
programme.desc: Mariana uncovers a lethal supply chain of American firearms being smuggled into the hands of drug cartels and fueling record levels of gun violence throughout Mexico. The story takes an even more terrifying turn when the son of the worlds most notorious drug lord, El Chapo Guzman, is arrested and the cartel Mariana has infiltrated violently revolts.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: In Philly, CBP intercepts two shipping containers of bananas from the Dominican Republic loaded with 192 kilos of cocaine worth $13,500,000. In El Paso, CBP discovers over 40 kilos of marijuana underneath the hood of a car and HSI attempts a controlled delivery in town. In Fort Lauderdale, CBP officers stop a passenger traveling with suspicious boxes hidden inside bags of ginger and another with illegal pills.

programme.title: The Hidden Kingdoms of China
programme.desc: China is the worlds third biggest country by area. It has second largest economy on the planet and the largest population. But this documentary series takes you away from Chinas highly-populated mega-cities and explores the more remote locations of this fascinating country. Visiting forests, jungles, mountains and grasslands, we take a rare glimpse at parts of China that usually remain unseen. We see the wildlife that live amongst the stunning beauty of the Chinese landscapes - and how they survive in often demanding situations. With golden snub-nosed monkeys, bears, bees, elephants and the legendary giant panda. The Hidden Kingdoms of China is narrated by Michelle Yeoh.

programme.title: Jaguar: Jungle Icon of Guyana
programme.desc: A young jaguar is about to embark on the most important mission of his life, : to strike out and find a kingdom of his own. His journey will take him through varied habitats, each with its own cast of animals. Only if he can prove his worth will the jaguar be able to claim his throne in one of the last truly wild paradises on the planet.

programme.title: Wild Argentina
programme.desc: Whether right whales, penguins or sea lions - for the birth of their young, many marine creatures are drawn to Argentinas nearly 5,000 kilometer coastline. From their very first breath, its all about one thing for the little ones: survival. Orcas hunt for young sea lions with a special technique and seagulls fly merciless aerial attacks on baby whales. Extraordinary underwater images and impressive animal behavior make the film by Christian Baumeister a visual experience.

programme.title: Wild Argentina: Extreme Earth
programme.desc: In Argentinas breathtaking, yet imposing wilderness, every day is a fight for survival. The terrain is rugged and parched. The air is thin. The weather can change in an instant. And then there are the predators. A female puma stalks a valley in search of guanaco, while a tarantula defends itself against a hungry armadillo. Foxes will scavenge what they can…until one of the worlds largest vultures shows up. All the while, in the background, glaciers greedily hold on to the freshwater these animals so desperately need.

programme.title: The Hidden Kingdoms of China
programme.desc: China is the worlds third biggest country by area. It has second largest economy on the planet and the largest population. But this documentary series takes you away from Chinas highly-populated mega-cities and explores the more remote locations of this fascinating country. Extraordinary underwater images and impressive animal behavior make the film by Christian Baumeister a visual experience.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin leaves the Australian mainland to discover which of the island-dwelling animals is truly built to survive. First up, he meets the enigmatic green turtle on the Wellesley Islands. Next, he is on KGari (Fraser Island), where he tracks down a pack of the notorious dingoes. Finally, he encounters the formidable and aptly named death adder snake.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin journeys down Australias rivers to find which riparian animal is most built to survive. His first encounter is with the duck-billed platypus, a peculiar and adorable monotreme, or egg-laying mammal. Phil then gets a grip on the ultra-slimy long-finned eel and learns of its extraordinary reproductive habits before finally catching a river-dwelling bull shark.

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations

A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Katavi - Africas Fallen Paradise
programme.desc: Katavis wetlands are unrecognizable in a prolonged drought, reduced to fetid, overcrowded mud wallows. At last, rains resurrect the river, inch by inch. Tensions wash away as hippos and crocodiles rejoice in the return of deep water … but flooding traps lion cubs in a precarious position. Normality will finally return to Katavi, but amidst global climate change, for how long?

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: In the heart of Tanzania, the towering walls of the Ngorongoro crater sets a stage for one of the most infamous rivalries in the natural world. The sisters of a formidable lion pride clash with a hyena clan ruled by an all-powerful queen. The sisterhood share responsibility, while the hyena queen must play clan politics and enforce a strict hierarchy to keep her crown.

programme.title: Nicobar Islands: A Monkeys Long Tale
programme.desc: The Nicobar Islands were significantly impacted by the massive tsunami of 2004. This documentary is a compelling exploration of natures ability to adapt to millions of years of gradual tectonic change and a sudden natural disaster, and a journey into a world few people are fortunate enough to see.

programme.title: Katavi - Africas Fallen Paradise
programme.desc: Katavis wetlands are unrecognizable in a prolonged drought, reduced to fetid, overcrowded mud wallows. At last, rains resurrect the river, inch by inch. The sisterhood share responsibility, while the hyena queen must play clan politics and enforce a strict hierarchy to keep her crown.

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: Under the rainforest canopy of Central America is a secret world ruled by insects. Two tiny queens will give everything to build their empires. The ant queen will sacrifice her own body for the future of her growing colony while the beautiful orchid bee will stop at nothing for success; betraying those closest to her.

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: The Congo Forest in Central Africa is home to a secretive animal we still know very little about. Bonobos are one of our closest relatives, but in their society its females who rule. A young bonobo must leave behind her family, to find her place in the world. Here, friendship is the key to survival. She must make new friends and impress the alpha female before she can truly fit in.

programme.title: Nicobar Islands: A Monkeys Long Tale
programme.desc: The Nicobar Islands were significantly impacted by the massive tsunami of 2004. This documentary is a compelling exploration of natures ability to adapt to millions of years of gradual tectonic change and a sudden natural disaster, and a journey into a world few people are fortunate enough to see.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Born in Africa
programme.desc: Born in Africa is a documentary following the stories of newborns in five animal families in the African savanna, from their first steps to the moment they become independent. These little lions, cheetahs, hyenas, meerkats and jackals must face many challenges along the way, as their mothers do everything to protect them in these most vulnerable stages of life. Watch them as they grow and learn how to move and get by in the wilderness in this intimate portrayal of family dynamics in the natural world.

programme.title: Katavi - Africas Fallen Paradise
programme.desc: Katavis wetlands are unrecognizable in a prolonged drought, reduced to fetid, overcrowded mud wallows. At last, rains resurrect the river, inch by inch. Tensions wash away as hippos and crocodiles rejoice in the return of deep water … but flooding traps lion cubs in a precarious position. Normality will finally return to Katavi, but amidst global climate change, for how long?

programme.title: Nicobar Islands: A Monkeys Long Tale
programme.desc: The Nicobar Islands were significantly impacted by the massive tsunami of 2004. This documentary is a compelling exploration of natures ability to adapt to millions of years of gradual tectonic change and a sudden natural disaster, and a journey into a world few people are fortunate enough to see.

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: In the heart of Tanzania, the towering walls of the Ngorongoro crater sets a stage for one of the most infamous rivalries in the natural world. The sisters of a formidable lion pride clash with a hyena clan ruled by an all-powerful queen. The sisterhood share responsibility, while the hyena queen must play clan politics and enforce a strict hierarchy to keep her crown.

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: Under the rainforest canopy of Central America is a secret world ruled by insects. Two tiny queens will give everything to build their empires. The ant queen will sacrifice her own body for the future of her growing colony while the beautiful orchid bee will stop at nothing for success; betraying those closest to her.

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: The Congo Forest in Central Africa is home to a secretive animal we still know very little about. Bonobos are one of our closest relatives, but in their society its females who rule. A young bonobo must leave behind her family, to find her place in the world. Here, friendship is the key to survival. She must make new friends and impress the alpha female before she can truly fit in.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin dares into the Australian savannah to find the species most built to survive. First is Australias largest bird of prey, the majestic but intimidating wedge-tailed eagle. Next, Phil tracks down one of the worlds deadliest snakes, the coastal taipan. Finally, Phil faces the uniquely Australian frill-necked lizard, a reptile with fascinating defense mechanisms.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin wanders into Australias woodlands to find the species most adapted for survival. Phil first encounters the yellow-bellied glider, an intrepid marsupial with a built-in wingsuit. Next is one of Australias most abundant but deadly reptiles, the eastern brown snake. Last but certainly not least, Phil finds the iconic, cuddly and oh-so-sleepy koala.

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Africas Hunters
programme.desc: Large carnivores such as leopards, lions and hyenas are in constant competition for their next meal for their pack in Zambias Luangwa Valley. Following the lives of the wise old leopard Kamuti who rained over the prime territory in the Luangwa Valley for 10 years, a six-week-old lion cub and a clan of spotted hyenas, this documentary series allows audiences to see these magnificent animals like never before. With up-close imagery of animals existing within Luangwa Valley and their life in the wild, feel a part of the pack with Africas Hunters.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how cheetahs hunt their prey, offering new perspectives on the tactics employed by these expert predators when stalking, chasing and bringing down antelope and wildebeest. Following a young cheetah mother over 18-months as she teaches her three cubs the secrets of the hunt.

programme.title: NBA Special
programme.desc: Get the highlights of the untold stories of Scottish basketball. A look back on the fierce rivalry between Edinburgh and Falkirk that started a golden era for the sport in the 1980s, and the success of the national team at the 2018 Commonwealth Games.

programme.title: Sieviešu Nacionālā basketbola asociācija. Los Angeles Sparks vs Phoenix Mercury
programme.desc: Get the best moments of the Womens National Basketball Association, a professional basketball league in the United States. It currently is composed of twelve teams. programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, kurš ir pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki ar laiku pamanīs Maksa jauno, rotaļīgo labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirstiet Haizivs Mazuļa, viņa ģimenes un draugu sālsūdens pasaulē.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirstiet Haizivs Mazuļa, viņa ģimenes un draugu sālsūdens pasaulē.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Kad Vindzoru dārzos sāk pazust lietas, Džonatans domā, ka pie vainas ir melnais caurums, tādēļ Padingtons dodas kosmosa misijā. Simi un Padingtons mēģina varavīksnes galā atrast podu ar zeltu pēc tam, kad ir nejauši saplēsuši Baza kaleidoskopu.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons uzbūvē robotu, vārdā Padingtrons, taču, lai tas strādātu, nepieciešams īsts draugs. Bazs ielūdz visus uz Divali svinībām, Padingtons ir viņa strādīgais asistents, bet vai viņiem abiem izdosies izbaudīt svētku noslēguma uguņošanu?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad stirnai Podziņai jāšķērso Celtnieklīča lidostas skrejceļš, Rabls un komanda zina, kas jābūvē. Rabls un komanda uzbūvē milzu skrituļdēli tantes Celtnes un Rivera šovam. Taču, kad tas zaudē kontroli, suņiem jādzenas pakaļ!

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Mūsu varoņi ir atpakaļ, un šoreiz Briežu komanda pametīs šīs pasaules robežas! Gatavojies varonīgai planētas glābšanai ar dažādiem uzlabojumiem, jauniem tēliem, foršām lietām un satriecošiem piedzīvojumiem kosmosā!

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Kurš grib nozagt Karija kunga augstu vērtēto milzu ķirbi? Izmeklē policists Velss un Padingtons. Parkā ir slidotava, un Grūbera kungs māca Padingtonam slidot pirms ledus diskotēkas. Vai pašam pietiks drosmes kāpt uz ledus pēc kritiena?

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Pēdējā skolas dienā Džonatans un Džūdija nespēj vienoties, ko iesākt, tāpēc jāizlemj Padingtonam. Brauni atgriežas no brauciena uz pludmali ne tikai ar smiltīm matos. Kāpēc tā gliemežnīca kustās?

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons sadraudzējas ar kāpuru, kā arī kopā ar Džūdiju uzzina, ka visas pārmaiņas nav sliktas. Brauni piedalās ļoti azartiskā spēlē "Grīda ir lava", bet kurš uzvarēs? Ko par viņiem domās svarīgs viesis?

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Pievienojieties Padingtonam, kurš kļūst par pirmo lāčunautu, pateicoties Braunu ģimenei. Džonatans, Džūdija un Padingtons salasa dārzā visas kazenes, bet Karija kungs uzskata, ka dažas pienākas viņam. Vai tā ir jāatdod?

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirsti okeāna priekos kopā ar Haizivs Mazuli, viņa ģimeni un draugiem.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Jūras pīlīšu bumbas spēle kļūst par glābšanas misiju, kad Henka mīlulis Akmentiņš nonāk gliemja migā.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Jaunais Fransuā pieredz Barbapapas dzimšanu. Barbatēti iesloga zoodārzā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras palīdzību lūdz košā alebrihe Ale. Alebrihu koks ir novītis, tāpēc Dorai jādodas meklēt varavīksnes ūdens. Karstā dienā visi ilgojas pēc saldējuma, bet Valas furgons ir iestidzis smiltīs! Dora iet palīgā, lai visi tiktu pie aukstā našķa.

programme.title: Mazā Šefpavāriņa šovs
programme.desc: Šefpavāriņš uztic Olijam savu īpašo kukurūzas maizes pannu. Bet viss noiet greizi, kad tā tiek sabojāta. Šefpavāriņš un Olijs vēlas pagatavot kūku ar visvairāk kārtām, bet ātri vien saprot, cik grūti ir pagatavot kūku tādā izmērā.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Briežu komanda atgriezusies ar jauniem, neticamiem piedzīvojumiem un varonīgām glābšanas misijām. Trešajā sezonā drosmīgā komanda uzzina vairāk par brīnišķīgo visumu, atklāj neticamo Mirdzumu salu un izpēta Mirdzumu jūras dzelmi.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Tētis uzzina, ka ir grūti savākt naudu skolas jumtam, bet ir vieglāk skriet, kad dzenas pakaļ lapsene.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Tētis izkar savu tīro kreklu, lai to izžāvētu, bet Pepa, Džordžs un mamma notraipa to ar dubļiem. Viņi ieliek to mazgāties, bet Pepa ieliek arī savu sarkano kleitu, kas pārvērš tēta kreklu sārtu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs dodas izbraucienā ar laivu kopā ar vectēvu un papagaili Polliju, bet vēlāk vectēvs iemet ūdenī savu mobilo telefonu.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš grib paaugties lielāks, lai drīkstētu vizināties karuseļos - taču kļūst milzīgs! Dora viņam palīdz atgūt ierasto izmēru. Mugursomai ir īpaša dāvana Dorai, bet tā nevar atvērties! Draugi dodas lūgt palīdzību vecmāmiņai.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Dvīņi ciemojas Barbagudrā istabā. Kādus sapņus sasniegtu, ja es būtu miljardieris?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ceļā uz Parīzi Barbapapas atklāj vislabāko muzeju - Luvru! Barbalala ir apņēmusies ievērot ačgārno dienu.

programme.title: Ķepaiņu lietas
programme.desc: Antropomorfisku dzīvnieku pasaulē Sems Snovs un Kita Keisija ir elitāri KLEID (Slepenā dzīvnieku detektīvu ekspertu līga) aģenti, kas apceļo pasauli un risina noslēpumus, liekot lietā problēmu risināšanas un dzīvnieku faktu pārzināšanas prasmes.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš pieskata krokodilu bērneļus. Dora un Zābaciņš pierunā Trolli nogaršot empanadu Benija kioskā. Zābaciņš uzlaiko Tiko izgudrotus zābakus. Dvīņi priecājas par savu pirmo pinjatu, bet neviens nezina, kā to dabūt vaļā.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, kurš ir pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki ar laiku pamanīs Maksa jauno, rotaļīgo labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, kurš ir pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki ar laiku pamanīs Maksa jauno, rotaļīgo labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivsuns

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Henks ir savainojis spuru, bet viņam ir bail doties pie ārsta. Mazulis un Viljams meklē gardākos našķus okeānā.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirstiet Haizivs Mazuļa, viņa ģimenes un draugu sālsūdens pasaulē.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un Toka skrienas ar laiku, lai redzētu pirmo pilno Saules aptumsumu savā mūžā. Padingtons saņem izgudrotāja balvu Simi vietā, kad viņa ir pārāk sakautrējusies, lai atzītos, bet kādēļ gan viņa pēc tam izjūt greizsirdību un skumjas?

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Brauni dodas uz pludmali, lai pavadītu brīvdienas, un, ierodoties tur, satiek bākas uzraugu Šantiju. Padingtons, Džonatans un Džūdija apgūst glābēju praksi un ar glābēja Teilora palīdzību izglābj Brauna kungu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcim vajadzīga pasta nodaļa! Bet, kad celtni apsēž vāveres, suņiem jāizdomā risinājums. Rabla komanda izmanto savas būvniecības prasmes, lai pārveidotu super auto mazgātavu un nomazgātu fermeres Zojas sušķīgos dzīvniekus.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda strādā, lai pārvērstu Celtnieklīča pludmales promenādi spožā, svinīgā ziemas brīnumzemē. Kad sniegota diena izjauc Motores un Miksas Virpuļvāveres plānus, Rabla komanda dara to, ko prot vislabāk... būvē.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Mūsu varoņi ir atpakaļ, un šoreiz Briežu komanda pametīs šīs pasaules robežas! Gatavojies varonīgai planētas glābšanai ar dažādiem uzlabojumiem, jauniem tēliem, foršām lietām un satriecošiem piedzīvojumiem kosmosā!

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons priecājas par pilsētas saimniecības atklāšanu, bet dzīvnieki aizbēg, kad viņš atstāj vaļā vārtus. Vai dzīvniekus pagūs atrast? Bāzs māca Džonatanam un Padingtonam par atkārtoto izmantošanu. Vai par veikumu viņi saņems balvu?

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons, Džonatans un Džūdija raizējas, ka izsmēluši suņa Lakija veiksmi. Kā viņi pateiks to Sofijai? Pie Bāza ciemojas brāļameita Simija. Viņš grib pārsteigt meiteni ar ideālu picu, bet tas nebūs viegli izsalkušo dzīvnieku dēļ.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Džūdija burtiski pazaudē zobu. Vai to atradīs pirms likšanās uz auss, un vai zobu fejai garšos marmelāde? Padingtons kļūst par darba lāci un palīdz Brauna kungam mājas birojā, bet uzzina, ka datori mēdz niķoties.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Brauniem ir jauni kaimiņi, un Toka stāsta, ka dārzā ir goblins, un viņas tētis ir astronauts! Tā taču nav tiesa, vai ne? Padingtons, Džonatans un Džūdija nolēmuši veidot avīzi, bet viņiem vajag stāstu titullapai!

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirsti okeāna priekos kopā ar Haizivs Mazuli, viņa ģimeni un draugiem.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirsti okeāna priekos kopā ar Haizivs Mazuli, viņa ģimeni un draugiem.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirsti okeāna priekos kopā ar Haizivs Mazuli, viņa ģimeni un draugiem.

programme.title: Haizivs Mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Sava mīļākā seriāla iedvesmotie Haizivs Mazulis un Viljams izlemj kļūt par supervaroņiem.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Mazā Šefpavāriņa šovs
programme.desc: Šefpavāriņš un Olijs apsola Benzo, ka pagatavos viņam pupiņu kūku, lai nosvinētu Pupiņu dienu, bet izmēģinājuma kūkas viņiem patraucē. Šefpavāriņš un Olijs plāno grilēt kukurūzu, bet Rūbija iesprūst uz augsta kukurūzas kāta.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Mūsu varoņi ir atpakaļ, un šoreiz Briežu komanda pametīs šīs pasaules robežas! Gatavojies varonīgai planētas glābšanai ar dažādiem uzlabojumiem, jauniem tēliem, foršām lietām un satriecošiem piedzīvojumiem kosmosā!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepas franču draudzene ēzelīte Delfīna ierodas ciemos. Pepa paņem līdzi Delfīnu uz bērnudārzu, kur viņai iemāca "Bing, bong" dziesmu, kas patīk visai klasei.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Kad mamma palīdz Trušu jaunkundzei ugunsdzēsēju depo, viņu izsauc nodzēst liesmas tēta nekontrolējamajam grilam!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vecvecāki ierodas uz vakariņām pie mammas un tēta. Pepa un Džordžs ir pārāk noguruši, lai ietu gulēt, kamēr nav dzirdējuši pasaku.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras ģimene taisa pinjatu par godu māmiņas dzimšanas dienai, taču tā aizlido! Vai viņi to atradīs, pirms pārnāks māmiņa? Garnadzis nočiepj neredzamības segu un sāk čiept visu pēc kārtas. Dorai viņš jāaptur!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērniem ir garlaicīgi, jo ārā līst lietus. Barbagudrais uztaisa dekoderi, kas tulko dzīvnieku skaņas.

programme.title: Ķepaiņu lietas
programme.desc: Antropomorfisku dzīvnieku pasaulē Sems Snovs un Kita Keisija ir elitāri KLEID (Slepenā dzīvnieku detektīvu ekspertu līga) aģenti, kas apceļo pasauli un risina noslēpumus, liekot lietā problēmu risināšanas un dzīvnieku faktu pārzināšanas prasmes.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Briežu komanda atgriezusies ar jauniem, neticamiem piedzīvojumiem un varonīgām glābšanas misijām. Trešajā sezonā drosmīgā komanda uzzina vairāk par brīnišķīgo visumu, atklāj neticamo Mirdzumu salu un izpēta Mirdzumu jūras dzelmi.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcis gaida iemīļotas TV zvaigznes jauno filmu. Bet vispirms vajadzīgs kinoteātris, kur to skatīties! Vectēvs pastāsta suņukiem par apslēptiem dārgumiem. Lai tos atrastu, komandai jāstrādā ķepu ķepā!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Lielais Sarkanais Cālis nejauši sarucina Doru un Zābaciņu, tāpēc Doras brālītim un māsiņai jāpalīdz viņiem atkal kļūt lieliem. Dora glābj draugus no Benija gaisa balona, lai visi varētu doties uz svinībām Karalienes pilī.

programme.title: Mazā Šefpavāriņa šovs
programme.desc: Šefpavāriņš uztic Olijam savu īpašo kukurūzas maizes pannu. Bet viss noiet greizi, kad tā tiek sabojāta. Šefpavāriņš un Olijs vēlas pagatavot kūku ar visvairāk kārtām, bet ātri vien saprot, cik grūti ir pagatavot kūku tādā izmērā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabravo un Barbalala kļūst par maziem dumpiniekiem. Bet kas ir Barbatētis?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Katram bērnam ir jādemonstrē savs talants. Videospēles ir jautras, bet jāizbauda labi laikapstākļi!

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Zivzobu Feja lūdz Haizivju Tēti pastrādāt viņas vietā.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirsti okeāna priekos kopā ar Haizivs Mazuli, viņa ģimeni un draugiem.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mērei Greitvejai vajag daudz picas, un ātri! Bet, kad pieslēdzas Ātrmeistars, suņiem jānovērš viņa picas problēma. Kad ģimene pa Ātrmeistara ceļu nevar pagūt uz lidostu, Rabla komandai līdz izlidošanai jāuzbūvē jauns ceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mēre Greitveja un Dakija Dū kungs vēlas nodemonstrēt savas izpletņlēkšanas prasmes. Taču, kad patraucē vējš, suņi palīdz viņiem lēkt ar izpletni uz zemes! Kad Vīleram un cūkai Trifelei nesanāk slidot, komanda rod risinājumu uz riteņiem!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, kurš ir pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki ar laiku pamanīs Maksa jauno, rotaļīgo labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, kurš ir pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki ar laiku pamanīs Maksa jauno, rotaļīgo labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirstiet Haizivs Mazuļa, viņa ģimenes un draugu sālsūdens pasaulē.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirstiet Haizivs Mazuļa, viņa ģimenes un draugu sālsūdens pasaulē.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Kas rada dīvainos trokšņus alā? Džonatans domā, ka tā ir nāriņa, bet Padingtons nav pārliecināts Džūdija vēlas atrast fosiliju pludmalē, pārējiem, šķiet, veicas, izņemot viņu, vai Padingtons spēs palīdzēt?

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons uzzina, ka kaijas mīl frī kartupeļus un darīs visu, lai tos iegūtu, bet vai viņš spēs nogādāt pusdienas, kamēr tās ir karstas? Bākas gaisma ir sabojājusies, un ir miglaina nakts, vai Padingtons var palīdzēt izglābt kuģi jūrā?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcī tiek uzbūvēta pirmā viesnīca, kad ciemos atbrauc fermeres Zojas brālēns Hedlijs. Kad juceklis uz dabas takas apmulsina visus Dakija Dū kunga dzimšanas dienas ballītes viesus, ķepaiņi viņiem palīdz atrast ceļu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Tērauds liek profesoram radīt antigravitācijas staru, kas Rikardo rokās tiek izmantots nepareizi. Mafina lēkājošā bumba draud iznīcināt ikgadējo Ziemas festivālu! Kajam jāiemācās kaut ko upurēt lielāka mērķa vārdā.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Grūbera kungs izdara labu Padingtonam un saka, ka viņš var pateikties, izdarot labu kādam citam. Tas ir grūtāk nekā izklausās! Padingtons uzzina par kompostēšanu, pateicoties Mulča kungam. Vai viņš paspēs izaudzēt puķes tantei Lūsijai?

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons mācās par bitēm un nolemj palīdzēt tām ražot medu, iestādot puķes, bet kāds domā, ka tās ir nezāles! Vindzoras dārzos ir karstuma vilnis, Mateo izpārdevis visus saldējumus, tāpēc viņš kopā ar Padingtonu rada jaunu garšu!

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons savaino celi un dodas pie Dr. Jasmīnas. Kad viņa iziet, viņš tiek sajaukts ar ārstu. Vai Brauna kunga pidžamu ballīte atbildīs Brauna kundzes standartiem, kad Simi un Toka paliks pa nakti?

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons palīdz izperēt olu, bet ir jāgaida ļoti ilgi. Kad tā beidzot izšķiļas, viņš tiek pie pārsteiguma! Padingtons vēlas, kaut varētu piedalīties Braunu kāzās, apskatot fotogrāfijas, un viņi nolemj to visu atkārtot!

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirsti okeāna priekos kopā ar Haizivs Mazuli, viņa ģimeni un draugiem.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Samelojis, lai šķistu drosmīgs, Viljams ir spiests pārvarēt savas bailes un doties baisajā Aļģu mežā.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: Tyler Perrys Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylans grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their new normal, and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about swag and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: The teens find Uncle Charlies cassette tape about seeking a crystal in a Hidden Crypt... but the tape gets damaged before they hear the end. They find the crypt, but must survive its many traps by deciphering cryptic messages

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick and Squidina follow a runaway idea brick into Randomland. // After discovering that Patrick never finished behavioral training, the family home-schools him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The Krusty Krab crew goes to a big concert to sell krabby patties in Krusty Koncessionaires, then in Dream Hoppers, SpongeBob explores the melodious dreamscapes of his sleeping neighbours. 15:00 Rock, Paper, Scissors Rock, Paper and Scissors are three best friends who share an apartment together and compete over everything. programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur. Cosmo and Wanda bring Bary, a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period, to present day. Hazel makes wishes to find Bary a job but unfortunately, Bary never quite fits in. Worse, his giant dinosaur tail knocks out power to the whole city, ruining Dimmadelphias prized Electric Light Ice Cream Float Parade. With Hazel feeling remorseful, Bary musters inspiration from his hero, the great Thomas Rex-ison, and uses his dinosaur smarts to try to save the day. // Hazel has planned a night of watching scary movies with her new friend, Jasmine, but it turns out Jasmine hates scary movies. Rather than change the plan, Hazel wishes Jasmine had no fears. When Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, the fears escape Jasmines mind, coming into the real world. Hazel tries fighting the fears off but learns its Jasmine who must face them to make them disappear. Now, shes got to talk her new friend into doing everything shes most afraid of, which gets the attention of Fear Itself!

programme.title: Super Duper Bunny League
programme.desc: How did these ordinary bunnies become the Super Duper Bunny League? Watch and find out. After the evil Lord Sourman and his dragon, Sourbreath, go on a mouth puckering rampage, its up to the bunnies to dish out some sweet justice.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin and Theodore play a seemingly innocent game, which leads to unexpected consequences. ) 14:30 The Smurfs The Smurfs are back and Smurfier than ever! Join these bouncy blue characters as they go on all new adventures and to even greater heights! Smurf we go! 14:45 The Smurfs The Smurfs are back and Smurfier than ever! Join these bouncy blue characters as they go on all new adventures and to even greater heights! Smurf we go!

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: The school is looking for a new mascot, and Chloe and her new friends think they can make an impression by designing the winning entry. Chloe, Jinx, and Booch create a costume they are excited about, leaving it at the beach house until the they can present it at school. Meanwhile, Phoebe learns that Max has gotten them jobs at the school, but while he has a cushy Vice Principal job, she is the new Art teacher. Their argument over this leads to accidentally destroying it the new mascot costume. After Chloe discovers what theyve done and is furious with them, Max and Phoebe realize that being her guardian comes with more responsibility than they imagined.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Super Duper Bunny League
programme.desc: The team must put their summer plans on hold when an ice-ray wielding villain attempts to freeze Important City. When Annabelle takes the team camping without their powers, its up to her to save the day when things go wrong.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazels feelings are hurt when her friends decide to go to the school dance instead of her book club. She storms off, but then realizes she wants to go to the dance too. Hazel wishes for Kennueth, a half-fish, half-man character from her favorite manga, to come out of his story and take her to the dance. Hazel must get through the dance before Kennueths true form, and magic, are revealed. // Hazel learns about the harmful effects of trash and pollution on Earth, so she wishes that people wouldnt be such trash monsters. Then, Dale Dimmadome tricks Danky into helping him sell more products, making people even bigger trash monsters! Hazel must get Danky back and stop Dale Dimmadome in his wasteful tracks.

programme.title: The Really Loud House
programme.desc: Clincoln McCloud is back in the movie business. This time they have a star, Loris boyfriend Bobby. Lori and Bobby break up, and Lincoln and Clyde still have one scene left to shoot! Can The Man with the Plan get Lori and Bobby back together?

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: Tyler Perrys Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylans grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their new normal, and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about swag and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Fourteen-year-old Taylor and her best friends are determined to uncover every mystery and investigate every unexplained event on Rock Island while they search for her Uncle Charlie who disappeared from the island five years ago.

programme.title: Super Duper Bunny League
programme.desc: The team must defeat Lizard Lips and his hungry T-Rex who threaten fans at the Important City ballpark. The team must act fast to stop a Space Pirate Captain who threatens to ruin their surprise party plans for Dereks birthday.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max unwittingly let Chloes friends watch a horror movie and eat candy, leaving them traumatized and craving more sugar. Jinx and Boochs parents want to meet with Chloes parents to discuss the lack of supervision at the beach house. With Hank and Barb away, Max and Phoebe are determined to prove they can be good guardians, and use a disguise gadget to transform into their parents to help Chloe. It goes well until the real Hank and Barb show up, and must transform into Max and Phoebe to keep the ruse going.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its Kindness Day! Mr. Guzman announces that if all students complete one act of kindness, theyll get a class pizza party-and Hazel wants that pizza! But when Dev refuses to participate, Cosmo and Wanda call on the Pe-Az, a trio of alien diplomats, to reason with him. Despite their best efforts, Dev outsmarts the Pe-Az and uses their alien technology to get rid of all the pizza on Earth. // Hazel must take matters into her own hands to get to the bottom of Devs surly attitude and save pizza! When Hazel makes a wish to understand why Dev acts the way he does, she gets paired with him for a class scavenger hunt. They struggle to work together, but, as the day goes on, they develop a friendship. However, that falls apart when Devs dad, Dale, belittles their effort, causing Dev to turn on Hazel again to save face. Will Dev be able to overcome his pride and finish the project, or will his issues with his dad tank both their grades?

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: Tyler Perrys Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylans grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their new normal, and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about swag and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Overwhelmed, Lila wishes for a simple life in front of a painting... only to get stuck inside it! The others find a strange boy in her place, whom they must convince to return to the painting. But first, they have to catch him.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: The twins take a cactus called Pricklebutt to the beach and end up mounting a dramatic search and rescue mission. // Best and Bester wont let Grumpy Pants round of golf stop them from catching the finale of their favourite show.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Its Best to the rescue when Besters phobia of camels threatens to de-rail her chances of being dance champ. // Best and Bester go busking, but will Best cope with competition and what happens when burgers and banjos collide?

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Bester finds that the only way to get her brothers attention when hes glued to the game, is to be in the game. // Best and Bester stage a crazy publicity stunt for Grafifis repair shop which has everyone fearing for their lives.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness
programme.desc: Po the Panda trains, battles, learns, teaches, stumbles, gabs and "geeks out" as the newest hero in the Valley of Peace. Now living in his permanent home at the Jade Palace with the rest of the Furious Five, Po will have to take on new responsibilities and face brand-new adversaries (not seen in the movies) in his continuing education as the Dragon Warrior...for being the Dragon Warrior is not a destination, its a journey (unfortunately for Po, that journey is uphill).

programme.title: Wallykazam!
programme.desc: Wallykazam! is about the adventures of Wally Trollman and his pet dragon, Norville. Wally has a magic stick that makes words come to life; each story has a new set of magic words, and Wally uses these words to playfully transform the world around him.

programme.title: Winx Club
programme.desc: Meet Bloom, a girl from Earth, who after she finds out that she is a fairy joins Alfea College on the planet Magix- a magical universe that is inhabited by fairies, witches and other mythical creatures. At Alfea College, fairy warriors from all over the universe study to improve their supernatural powers and here Bloom befriends five other fairies - Stella, the fairy of the Sun, Flora, the fairy of nature, Tecna, the fairy of technology, Musa, the fairy of music and Aisha, the fairy of waves. Together, this group of girls known as the Winx, become best friends and the force to be reckoned with as they experience incredible adventures while defending their universe from varous enemies.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.
